Description:
Please mind that the staff@mastodon.social e-mail is for inquiries related to the operation of the mastodon.social server specifically. If your account is on another server, we will not be able to assist you. For inquiries not related specifically to the operation of this server, such as press inquiries about Mastodon gGmbH, please contact press@joinmastodon.org. Additional addresses:

  • Legal, GDPR, DMCA: legal@mastodon.social
  • Appeals: moderation@mastodon.social

Funding

This server is crowdfunded by Patreon donations. For a list of sponsors, see joinmastodon.org.

Reporting and moderation

When reporting accounts, please make sure to include at least a few posts that show rule-breaking behaviour, when applicable. If there is any additional context that might help make a decision, please also include it in the comment. This is especially important when the content is in a language nobody on the moderation team speaks.

We usually handle reports within 24 hours. Please mind that you are not notified when a report you have made has led to a punitive action, and that not all punitive actions are externally visible. For first time offenses, we may opt to delete offending content, escalating to harsher measures on repeat offenses.

We have a team of paid moderators. If you would like to become a moderator, get in touch with us through the e-mail address above.

Impressum

Mastodon gGmbH
Mühlenstraße 8a
14167 Berlin
Germany

Todon.nl is een radicaal linkse anti-autoritaire Mastodonserver. Wij verwelkomen anarchisten, socialisten, (klimaat)activisten, LHBTQIA+-personen, milieubewuste mensen, intersectionelen, antiracisten, antifascisten, antikapitalisten, veganisten, piraten, mensenrechtenactivisten, enz. Als ze maar radicaal, links én anti-autoritair zijn.

Meer leren ⟶

Todon.nl ist ein linksradikaler, antiautoritärer Mastodon-Server. Wir heißen Anarchist_innen, Sozialist_innen, (Klima-)Aktivist_innen, LSBTQIA+ Personen, Umweltbewegung, Antirassist_innen, Antifaschist_innen, Antikapitalist_innen, Intersektionalist_innen, Veganer_innen, Pirat_innen, Menschenrechtler_innen, etc. willkommen. Solange sie radikal, links únd antiautoritär sind.

Mehr erfahren ⟶

Todon.nl is a radical leftist anti-authoritarian Mastodon server. We welcome anarchists, socialists, (climate) activists, the LGBTQIA+ community, environmentalists, anti-racists, anti-fascists, anti-capitalists, intersectionalists, vegans, pirates, human rights activists, etc. As far as they are radical, leftist and anti-authoritarian.

Learn more ⟶

Todon.nl es un servidor de Mastodon de izquierda radical antiautoritaria. Damos la bienvenida a anarquistas, socialistas, activistas (climáticos), personas del colectivo LGBTQIA+, ambientalistas, anti-racistas, anti-fascistas, anti-capitalistas, interseccionalistas, veganxs, piratas, activistas por los derechos humanos, etc. Siempre que sean radicales, de izquierdas y antiautoritarios.

Saber más ⟶

Welkom op Todon.nl! Lees eerst onze uitgebreide gebruiksvoorwaarden (inclusief onze regels) en ons privacybeleid.

Om een idee te geven – wij accepteren (onder andere) geen: racisme, seksisme, homofobie, transfobie, seksisme, validisme en andere vormen van discriminatie, lastig vallen van mensen, haatzaaien, getrol, (seksueel) misbruik van minder- en meerderjarigen (ook niet virtueel), verheerlijking van geweld, militarisme, nationalisme en rechts-populisme, rechts- en religieus extremisme, tankies (ML), kapitalisten, (rechtse) complot'theorieën', hoaxes en uiteraard geen spam en andere vormen van reclame.

Wil je hier een account? Vertel ons precies waarom je je hier wilt aanmelden! Waarom speciaal Todon.nl en niet één van de vele andere Mastodonservers? We willen vooral weten wat voor linkse politieke overtuiging je hebt, zodat we kunnen zien of deze compatibel is met die van ons. Help ons gewoonweg om onze taak om jouw aanvraag goed te keuren eenvoudiger te maken.

Deze Mastodonserver is de tweelingserver van Todon.eu. Ze worden beiden beheerd en gemodereerd door een klein collectief van vrijwilligers. Wij accepteren alle talen, hoewel Engels, Nederlands, Duits en Spaans het populairst zijn op deze Mastodonserver. Moderatie is in het Engels, Nederlands, Spaans, Duits, Deens, Zweeds en Noors.

Kenmerken:

  • Maximaal aantal tekens voor toots: 1312 (i.p.v. 500)
  • Zoeklimiet: 11 (i.p.v. 5)
  • Indexering door zoekmachines staat standaard uitgeschakeld
  • Ongeautoriseerde toegang tot de openbare tijdlijn is niet toegestaan

Thema's:

  • Todon (donker - standaard):
    • in de eenvoudige webomgeving met één kolom hetzelfde als het standaardthema van het Mastodonproject.
    • in de geavanceerde webomgeving het standaardthema van het Mastodonproject, maar over de volledige breedte en met enkele kleine aanpassingen (compatibel met de meeste schermresoluties, incl. brede schermen).
  • Mastodon (licht):
    • het lichte standaardthema van het Mastodonproject.
    • in de geavanceerde webomgeving over de volledige breedte, zoals het standaardthema van Todon.nl.
  • Mastodon (hoog contrast):
    • het (donkere) standaardthema van het Mastodonproject in hoog contrast.
    • in de geavanceerde webomgeving over de volledige breedte, zoals het standaardthema van Todon.nl.

Willkommen auf Todon.nl! Bitte lies zuerst unsere Nutzungsbedingungen (inklusive unserer Regeln) und unsere Datenschutzerklärung.

Um dir einen ersten Eindruck zu vermitteln – wir akzeptieren nicht: Rassismus, homophobes und transphobes Verhalten, Sexismus, Ableismus und andere Formen von Diskriminierung, Belästigung, Trolling, Hassrede, (sexuellen) Missbrauch Minderjährige und Erwachsener (auch nicht virtuell), Gewaltverherrlichung, Militarismus, Nationalismus und Rechtspopulismus sowie, rechten und religiösen Extremismus, tankies (ML), Kapitalisten, (rechte) Verschwörungs'theorien', Hoaxes, und natürlich Spam oder andere Formen von Werbung.

Du möchtest beitreten? Sag uns genau, warum du unserem Server beitreten möchtest! Wieso hast du dich für Todon.nl entschieden und nicht für eine der anderen zahlreichen Mastodon-Instanzen? Insbesondere wüssten wir gerne, welchen linken Anschauungen ihr euch zugehörig fühlt, um zu sehen, ob diese mit den unsrigen kompatibel sind. Diese Auskunft macht es uns leichter, deine Registrierung zu bestätigen.

Bei uns sind alle Sprachen willkommen, wobei Englisch, Niederländisch, Deutsch und Spanisch auf dieser Instanz am meisten gesprochen werden. Moderation findet auf Englisch, Niederländisch, Spanisch, Deutsch, Dänisch, Schwedisch und Norwegisch statt.

Merkmale:

  • Zeichenbeschränkungen für Toots: 1312 (anstelle von 500)
  • Suchbeschränkung: 11 (anstelle von 5)

Farbschemata:

  • Todon (Dunkel - Standard):
    • eine Version des (dunkle) Standardinterfaces von Mastodon in voller Breite (kompatibel mit den meisten Bildschirmauflösungen, inklusive Breitbild)
  • Mastodon (Hell):
    • Das helle Standardinterface, aber in voller Breite
  • Mastodon (Hoher Kontrast):
    • Das dunkle Hochkontrastschema, aber in voller Breite

Welcome on Todon.nl! Please read first our comprehensive terms of service (including our rules) and our privacy policy.

To give you an idea – we do not accept (among other things): racism, homophobia, transphobia, sexism, ableism and other forms of discrimination, harassment, trolling, hate speech, (sexual) abuse of minors and adults (also not virtual), glorification of violence, militarism, nationalism and right-wing populism, right-wing and religious extremism, tankies (ML), capitalists, (right-wing) conspiracy 'theories', hoaxes, and of course no spam and other forms of advertisement.

Want to join us? Tell us exactly why you want to join us! Why especially Todon.nl and not one of the many other Mastodon servers? We especially like to know what kind of leftist political beliefs you have, so that we can see if they are compatible with ours. Just help us to make our job to approve your request easier.

If you don't receive a welcome email in 24 hours, your invite request is (probably) declined.

This Mastodon server is the twin server of Todon.eu. They are both run and moderated by a small collective of volunteers. We accept all languages, although English, Dutch, German and Spanish are the most popular on this server. Moderation is in English, Dutch, Spanish, German, Danish, Swedish and Norwegian.

Features:

  • Character limit of toots: 1312 (instead of 500)
  • Search limit: 11 (instead of 5)
  • Search engine indexing disabled by default
  • Unauthenticated access to public timelines disabled

Themes:

  • Todon (Dark - default):
    • in the single column interface the same as the default Mastodon project theme.
    • in the advanced web interface a full width version of the default Mastodon project theme, with some minor modifications (compatible with most screen resolutions, incl. wide screens).
  • Mastodon (Light):
    • the light default project theme
    • full width in the advanced web interface, like the Todon.nl default theme.
  • Mastodon (High contrast):
    • the (dark) high contrast default project theme
    • full width in the advanced web interface, like the Todon.nl default theme.

¡Bienvenidx a todon.nl! Por favor lee los términos de servicio (incluyendo nuestras reglas) y nuestra política de privacidad.

Para darte una idea, no aceptamos (entre otras cosas): racismo, homofobia, transfobia, sexismos, capacitismo y cualquier otra forma de discriminación, acoso, trolleo, discursos de odio, abuso (sexual) de menores y adultxs (medios digitales incluidos), glorificación de la violencia, militarismo, nacionalismo y populismo de derecha, extremismo de derecha y religioso, tankies (M-L), capitalistas, 'teorías' conspirativas (de derecha), bulos y por supuesto spam ni otras formas de publicidad.

¿Quieres unirte a nosotrxs? Nos gustaría que te tomaras un tiempo en decirnos por que quieres unirte a nosotrxs. ¿Por qué Todon.nl y no otro de los tantos servidores de Mastodon? Especialmente nos gustaría saber cuales son tus líneas políticas de izquierda para saber si son compatibles con las nuestras. Ayudanos a que nuestra labor de aprovar tu propuesta sea mas fácil.

Aceptamos todos los idiomas, aunque el inglés, holandés, alemán y castellano son los más populares aquí. Lxs moderadorxs hablan inglés, holandés, castellano, alemán, danés, sueco y noruego.

Características:

  • Límites de caracteres para toots: 1312 (en vez de 500)
  • Límite de búsqueda: 11 (en vez de 5)

Diseños:

  • Todon (oscuro - por defecto):
    • versión a ancho completo de pantalla del tema oscuro por defecto de Mastodon, compatible con la mayoría de las resoluciones de pantalla, incluyendo pantallas anchas.
  • Mastodon (claro):
    • el tema claro por defecto, con ancho completo
  • Mastodon (alto contraste):
    • el tema de alto contraste oscuro por defecto, con ancho completo

Are you looking for our list of limited and suspended Fediverse servers? Look on our wiki.

Please go to this page if you are a copyright holder and think someone on this website infringed your copyright.
Short: Radicaal linkse anti-autoritaire server. Voor anarchisten, socialisten, (klimaat)activisten, LHBTQIA+, antiracisten, antifascisten, antikapitalisten, intersectionelen, veganisten, mensenrechten, enz.

Description:
Elekk is a Mastodon instance by gamers, for gamers. Games of any type are welcome here - computer games, console games, tabletop games, etc. - as well as game development of any kind. Whether you make games, play games, or some of both, this is the place for you.

EXCEPT: the ideologies of Gamergate and the alt-right are unconditionally unwelcome here. This is an actively diverse and feminist space, and GG and the alt-right are a rejection of that. Any harassment or posts that represent GG or the alt-right, in the sole judgment of the administration, will be removed and may result in suspension of your account.

Elekk is not hosted in the EU and does not recognize the authority of the EU to govern the internet.

Support

You can support Elekk financially by contributing via Patreon (recurring).

Guidelines

The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of Elekk.xyz. They are here to provide you with insight into our philosophy and content moderation policies.


As a courtesy, if you post images to Elekk that you didn't create, please include credit to the creator, and preferably a link to the image's source.


Accounts that automate their posting, including but not limited to bots and cross-posters from other social media, should mark automated posts as Unlisted instead of Public, unless you have the explicit consent of the administrators.


The following types of content may be removed from the public timeline at the discretion of the moderator.

  • Excessive advertising
  • Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources
  • Untagged nudity, pornography and sexually explicit content, including artistic depictions
  • Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence, including artistic depictions
  • Deliberately inflammatory content with the intent to trigger or hurt others, at the discretion of administration.

The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service.

  • Racism or advocation of racism
  • Sexism or advocation of sexism
  • Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof
  • Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service.

  • Sexual depictions of children
  • Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism
  • Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism (i.e. the Nazi party), the political far or "alt"-right, or Gamergate
  • Content illegal in the United States

Any conduct intended to stalk other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, identified at the sole discretion of the administrator and moderators, is also disallowed, and subject to action up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

  • Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.
  • Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.
  • Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.


Mutant Standard

This instance might use Mutant Standard emoji made by Dzuk, which are licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International License. I'm honestly not sure whether or not we do, but it never hurts to be thorough.


GDPR and CCPA

Elekk uses cookies to maintain your login session and for no other reason.

Elekk stores your email address, which is used as your account name to log you in. Your email is not visible to anyone but the administrators of the site. We do not send you email unless you request it.

Elekk has no advertising partners. Because of the nature of a federated social network, we share your non-private posts with other servers. However, we do not share your personal data, or aggregated non-personal data, with anyone. We do publish statistical data about the entire body of Elekk users as a way for others to measure the health of our instance, but your individual information cannot be extracted from those figures.


Scraping

Each user of Elekk.XYZ retains all copyright to the original content of posts they make on Elekk.XYZ. You may not make a copy for any purpose other than the normal functioning of ActivityPub federation and the RSS feeds generated by the Mastodon software of any content originally posted to Elekk.XYZ without acquiring the affirmative consent of the administrator for each post you wish to copy. If you maintain a copy or depiction of any post that originated on Elekk.XYZ, you must regularly check back with the server to determine whether that post has been changed or removed, and you must update your copy or depiction to reflect any changes to the post, or remove your copy or depiction if the post has been removed.


Help, I've been suspended!

If you were an Elekk user and your account was suspended:

Elekk's moderators use account suspension as a measure of last resort. If we suspended your account, the decision was final, in part because we cannot recover your account; suspension irrevocably destroys all data associated with a Mastodon account.

If you are a remote user and you believe your account or your instance was suspended by Elekk:

As this policy has recently been abused, it has been revoked. Remote suspensions are now final, until further notice.
topic: Elekk: Gameing and Other Delightful Pursuits

Description:
🇬🇧 English version

🏡 Presentation

EQS is a Mastodon instance/server for fans of little ponies, that has been online since May 8th, 2017. It is part of the fediverse, a large decentralized social network.

⚠️ Due to spam, accounts are approved manually. Please be clear in your registration message, or you will be considered a robot. If you did not receive the registration email, try looking in the junk folder, or use another address. Indeed, some mailbox providers may block us.

If you wish, you can financially help the instance on Liberapay (It's a bit like Patreon or Tipeee, but free).

🦄 Our friends (Who speak English)
  • Canterlot Comics, a webcomic library

📑 Server rules

Rules are necessary to ensure a healthy community. The general rule of thumb here is to respect others and to use your common sense. Simply put, don't be a d*ck.

  1. Illegal content under French and European law (Including off-site links) is not permitted. You are legally responsible for the content that you post.
  2. Hate speech is not allowed. This includes racism, xenophobia, LGBTphobia, queerphobia, fatphobia, etc...
  3. Be pony-like ! Don't harass others, and don't encourage it.
  4. To keep the timeline easy-to-read, don't post spam messages or excessively shitpost.
  5. User accounts may not be used solely for advertising. You can still register as a brony/furry convention or meet-up.
  6. If you would like to create a bot account, please contact a moderator. Also, these accounts are not allowed to interact with users unless directly mentioned.
  7. You may not use a disposable mail service to create an account.
  8. Anything that depicts nudity, pornography, or anything not suitable for minors must use a content warning label (CW). Sexual content depicting minors is forbidden.
  9. Impersonation is prohibited. Parody accounts must state that they are.
  10. If you post someone else's content (Such as fanart), please credit the original creator.
  11. Inciting danger is prohibited. This applies (but not limited) to finance and health, for example. Cryptocurrencies are included in this ban.
  12. Promoting organizations or ideologies that go against our rules is prohibited. For example, you can't promote a political party that incites hatred or harassment. In case it's not already clear: If you're far-right, you'll save time by registering elsewhere.
  13. Multi-accounts are allowed as long as they are not used to circumvent a sanction or a user block. When creating a new account, please enter the name of your main account (to help moderation).

Moderators are instructed to be tolerant and to give a second chance if the infraction is not serious. Also, it is important to maintain friendly relations between moderators and users, so don't hesitate to reach out if you feel there's a problem.

🙏 Credits

The notification sound was created by OhPonyBoy.

🇫🇷 Version française

🏡 Introduction

EQS est une instance/serveur Mastodon pour les fans de petits poneys, qui est en ligne depuis le 8 mai 2017. Elle fait partie du fediverse, un grand réseau social décentralisé.

⚠️ En raison de spams, les comptes sont approuvés manuellement. Merci d'être clair dans votre message d'inscription, ou vous serez considéré comme un robot. Si vous n'avez pas reçu le courriel d'inscription, essayez de regarder dans le dossier des indésirables, ou utilisez une autre adresse. En effet, certains fournisseurs de boîte mail peuvent nous bloquer.

Si vous le souhaitez, vous pouvez aider financièrement l'instance sur Liberapay (C'est un peu comme Patreon ou Tipeee, mais en libre).

🦄 Nos copains (Qui parlent français)
  • Radio Brony, une webradio
  • Canterlot Comics, une bibliothèque de webcomics
  • Le Poney Blanc, un blog autour de cartoons dont MLP
  • New Lunar Republic, un site de streaming de la série MLP FiM
  • MLP France, un site de streaming de cartoons dont MLP
  • Need for Ponies, un autre site de streaming de cartoons dont MLP

📑 Règles du serveur

Les règles sont nécessaires pour garantir une communauté saine. La règle générale est de respecter les autres et d'utiliser son bon sens. En d'autres termes, ne soyez pas un c*n.

  1. Les contenus illégaux au regard du droit français et européen (Y compris les liens hors site) ne sont pas autorisés. Vous êtes légalement responsable du contenu que vous publiez.
  2. Les propos haineux ne sont pas autorisés. Cela inclut le racisme, la xénophobie, les LGBTphobies, la queerphobie, la grossophobie, etc...
  3. Soyez un poney ! Ne harcelez pas les autres, et n'y incitez pas.
  4. Pour que la timeline reste facile à lire, ne postez pas de messages de spam ou de shitpost excessifs.
  5. Les comptes d'utilisateurs ne peuvent pas être utilisés uniquement à des fins publicitaires. Vous pouvez tout de même vous inscrire en tant que convention ou meet-up brony/furry.
  6. Si vous souhaitez créer un compte robot, veuillez contacter un·e modérateur·ice. De plus, ces comptes ne sont pas autorisés à interagir avec les utilisateurs, sauf s'ils sont directement mentionnés.
  7. Vous ne pouvez pas utiliser un service de courrier jetable pour créer un compte.
  8. Tout ce qui montre de la nudité, de la pornographie ou tout ce qui ne convient pas aux mineurs doit porter un avertissement de contenu (CW). Les contenus à caractère sexuel mettant en scène des mineurs sont interdits.
  9. L'usurpation d'identité est interdite. Les comptes parodiques doivent préciser qu'ils en sont.
  10. Si vous publiez le contenu de quelqu'un d'autre (Comme un fanart), merci de créditer le créateur·rice original.
  11. Inciter au danger est interdit. Cela concerne par exemple la finance et la santé. Les cryptomonnaies sont inclues dans cette interdiction.
  12. Promouvoir des organisations ou des idéologies qui vont à l’encontre de nos règles est interdit. Par exemple, vous ne pouvez pas promouvoir un parti politique qui incite à la haine ou au harcèlement. Dans le cas où ce ne serait pas déjà assez clair : Si vous êtes d'extrême droite, vous gagnerez du temps à vous inscrire ailleurs.
  13. Le multi-compte est autorisé tant qu'il ne sert pas à contourner une sanction ou un blocage d'utilisateur. A la création d'un nouveau compte, merci de renseigner le nom de votre compte principal (afin d'aider la modération).

Les modérateurs ont pour ordre d'être tolérant et de laisser une seconde chance si l'infraction n'est pas grave. De plus, il est important de maintenir des relations amicales entre les modérateurs et les utilisateurs, alors n'hésitez pas à nous contacter si vous pensez qu'il y a un problème.

🙏 Crédits

Le son de notification a été créé par OhPonyBoy.

🌐 Misc / Divers

👥 Moderation team / L'équipe de modération
  • @C_Chell
  • @fastfinge
  • @Deliambre
  • @Lunar
  • @cloudhop
  • @Shredd_Tone

😺 Custom emojis / Emojis personnalisés

  • HiccupsDoesArt :

  • Comeha & Midori-no-Ink (Derpibooru) :

  • PussPuss :

  • Wenni :

  • Miraculous Rubipphire :

  • Scraton :

  • Blobs :
Short: The instance for fans of little ponies. 🦄 L'instance pour les fans de petits poneys.

Description:
Rules of ieji.de
Targeted misgendering, deadnaming, or promotion of so-called "conversion therapy" is prohibited.
Harassing people in any way, racism, sexism or transphobia is strictly forbidden.
Being a "minor attracted person" / pedophile spreading pictures of minors will get you erased and reported to authorities.
Accounts mainly used for spam, porn, advertisements or backlinking are immediatly deleted.
Do not break german law (no nazis or extremists allowed).
Do not post erotic content without content warning.
Do not spread explicit pictures or copyrighted material.

Short description(TL;DR of the core values)
This instance is strongly focused on user privacy, we save no IP(changing your IP with 127.0.0.1 before it gets sent to Mastodon), are accessible via tor and yggdrasil and use no cloudflare.
We use an hilarious amount of serverpower to provide the best possible experience, please let us know of any speed shortcomings.
Free speech is a precious good, but it has it's limits.
We ban bigots, racists, terfs and users that break german or international laws, objections are denied in these cases.

Core values of ieji.de

Safety
Our strongest core value is to be a safe place for everyone, if we notice any kind of harassment coming from or going towards our instances,
the offending accounts are suspended without parole.

Security
We use the latest security technology to prevent sensitive data from being accessed from the outside with systems like CrowdSec and implementing the latest TLS standards. This includes not using Cloudflare at all as this would jeopardize your privacy as a huge MITM attack vector.
A sophisticated anti-ddos filter from CDN77 in addition to the well known Arbor Networks filter nullify most attacks.
Daily full backups of the database and a daily incremental backup of media files are being made towards a different datacenter within Frankfurt.

Performance
Another main goal is showcasing how fast mastodon can be by deploying it on the best highest clocking machine money can buy in a one of a kind european datacenter with active-active routing, the usage of CDN77s vast network and using a webserver which enables the latest webtechnologies like http/3, CASPer and quic (h2o).

Anonymity
The h2o webserver does not create any logs, Mastodon is being given a false IP (127.0.0.1) and we have a tor hidden service address with https enabled and a valid certificate from harica. Also accessible via Yggdrasil Network. These require acceptance of the tor onion cert. Also an early supporter of WirSpeichernNicht (german for WeDontStore), a movement against the data retention law that was planned earlier in Germany, pledging not to make logs.

Features
Whatever comes up as features at Mastodon, we implement it, we want you to have the best Mastodon experience there is, this includes:
Full Text Search via ElasticSearch, Translation Service via LibreTranslate and a relay service via AodeRelay, besides some relays, crowdsec and netdata, both very heavy focused on data privacy, no external services are being used.

Longevity
The service is online since may 8th, 2017 and is here to stay, also thanks to the continuous support from our community.

Ecofriendly
This instance is hosted at SYNLINQ which houses the servers in the modern maincubes FRA01 datacenter which only uses green energy and energy efficient cooling like the kyoto wheel.



Threads.net is blocked via domain block and iptables drop as the company has a horrendous past and does not at all align with our idea of privacy and safety.
Bridgy is blocked, as we do not want to rely on such services and rather promote using compatible standards.


Bots are fine as long as they are useful


Team

Admin
SolSoCoG

Mods
Dan Am
sexybiggetje
Clara
Adrian Morales


Impressum/Imprint and Datenschutz/Data Security information in german


The server acts according to the Mastodon Server Covenant

Unfortunately ieji.de has issues on delivery towards these instances because we were suspended:
mastodon.art
solarpunk.moe
pettingzoo.co

Monthly costs
Hardware
Main servers
2 machines with the following specs:
AMD Ryzen 9 7950X 16-Core 5.5GHz, 128GB DDR5-4800 RAM, 2x4TB PCIE4 NVME(PM9A3), 10Gbps Mellanox connect x3 pro nic, premium active-active networking, SYNLINQ Frankfurt, Germany
For running ieji.de, rel.re, libretranslate.de and other services
costs: 237€/m x 2
16 additional IPv4 adresses costs: 24€/m
BorgBase BorgBackup space in the EU: $15/m

Now that you know the price for stellar performance,
feel free to support ieji.de if you enjoy the service

Short: ieji.de is a generalistic mastodon instance, with the goal of being the fastest mastodon instance in Europe and with a focus on user privacy, like being usable via the tor network.

Description:
We're a stable, long-running Mastodon instance for writers since 2017.

We're an inclusive community that welcomes all, as long as you're kind and respectful to others. We aim to provide an environment where you feel comfortable enough to participate freely and authentically. If you're not interested in that, there are plenty of other great instances to join.

What we're here for

We're here to discuss and find community around the act of writing. Want someone to critique your writing? Ask the community. Need a little encouragement? We're all supportive here. Swap reviews, share your struggles, set time aside to write together, or just send out small chunks of writing for the community to read.

Guidelines

In general, be good to each other. Enjoy talking to strangers (and friends!) on the internet, and give others the benefit of the doubt.

On commerce: if you are first and foremost engaged with the community, please feel free to also talk about your commercial work or projects. We only ask that you don't use our community as a free advertising channel. If you see any Writing Exchange accounts that seem to be pure spam, please report them.

On brands: on both the fediverse and Writing Exchange in particular, we're about people, not brands. If you represent a writing-related brand and want to create an account here, we again expect you to contribute to the community, and not simply advertise to everyone. Ideally, your brand account will be backed by a personal account, so we know who we're talking to and we can have more human conversations.

If problems arise, please use Mastodon's features to Block, Mute, or Report users that are causing problems. If you need more help, contact @matt.

Once you've joined

Introduce yourself! Communities like these work best when they're filled with strangers who talk to each other.

Then share yourself, your writing, and whatever feels right. We chose the name Writing Exchange because that's what we wanted to spark: an exchange. So don't be shy — trade words with people. Jump into conversations you wouldn't normally join. Share your processes and tools. Put your thoughts out to the community and see what can come from it.

Support

We are financially backed by community supporters and @matt's small company, Musing Studio / Write.as.

You can support this instance with a monthly or one-time donation on Open Collective.

More resources

  • Privacy Policy (for humans)
  • Writing Exchange Status
Short: A small, intentional community for poets, authors, and every kind of writer.

Description:
mstdn.tokyocameraclub.com とは？

mstdn.tokyocameraclub.comは東京カメラ部が運営するMastodonのインスタンス（サーバー）です。 「カメラがある暮らし」をより楽しくすることを目的として、写真や動画などを投稿・閲覧するためのグループです。こちらの趣旨に賛同いただける方はどなたでも無料で参加いただけます。

運営方針

  • 東京カメラ部の公式アカウントではMastodon、Facebook、Instagramなどから東京カメラ部とその分室に投稿いただいた作品の一部を適宜紹介させていただきます。
  • Mastodonでの東京カメラ部への投稿は投稿にハッシュタグ「#tokyocameraclub」を付けていただくだけで完了します。
  • その他運営方針はFacebookの東京カメラ部と同等となりますので、詳しくはこちらをご覧ください。

禁止行為

  • 著作権違反など日本国の法律に違反するする行為
  • 他者の人格、作品を誹謗中傷する行為
  • 実在の企業、組織、団体、人格、ブランド、商品などになりすます行為
  • 公序良俗に反する行為
  • 無闇にサーバーの負荷を高める行為
  • 禁止行為を行う方はアカウントを停止させていただく場合があります

注意事項

  • 確認メールが届くまで時間がかかるときがあります
  • 1－2時間たっても確認メールが届かない場合は迷惑メールに分類されている可能性があります。お手数ですが迷惑メールフォルダーを確認なさってください。
  • 本インスタンスは試験運用中です。予告なくメンテナンス実施、データリセット、サービス終了がなされる可能性はあります。
  • 当社は自社の裁量により利用者が本サービス規約に違反したと判断した場合は利用者のアカウントを削除、または利用者の本サービスへのアクセスを予告なく、また責任を利用者に対して負うことなく制限することがあります
  • 当社は本サービスを円滑に運営する目的で本規約を予告なく随時変更することがあります

連絡先

camera.jpn@tokyocameraclub.com
Short: mstdn.tokyocameraclub.comは東京カメラ部が運営するMastodonのインスタンス（サーバー）です。 「カメラがある暮らし」をより楽しくすることを目的として、写真や動画などを投稿・閲覧するためのグループです。こちらの趣旨に賛同いただける方はどなたでも無料で参加いただけます。

Description:
General Information

  • photog.social is a separate and independent instance and is not affiliated with the Mastodon organization.
  • Announcements can be found by following @ambassador@photog.social on Mastodon.

Admin/Mod Team

  • @Ambassador: Primary admin/final word

Support/Donations

The photog.social instance is run by the admin team using their own funds.

If you're feeling like supporting the photog.social Mastodon instance monentarily, feel free to choose an option below.

We appreciate it and 💖 the support!

  • Patreon
  • Liberapay
  • PayPal.me

Approved Bots

  • @Announce: Announcements and other important info..
  • @dPS_Challenge: Bot that cross posts Digital Photography School (dPS) weekly challenges.

Unavailable Content and Instance Moderation

We have blocked a number of Japanese instances media due to some forms of loli content being legal in Japan but illegal elsewhere. Given our server is located outside of Japan we took a pro-active stance on blocking media as a "just in case" moment. This does not mean you cannot interact with these instances, simply their media will not be cached or shown on our instance.

Some instances we have chosen to remove from our federated timeline. You can still follow accounts on these instances and if you follow a user on one of the instances that does not appear on our federated timeline, their posts will show in your personal timeline. These are mainly instances that tend to be busy and/or are known for overloading our federated timeline with posts.

Some instances we have chosen to block outright. Most of these instances are full of illegal content, hate speech and more. We've also blocked instances that have run harassment campaigns against others in the past. You will NOT be able to interact with these instances from our instance.
Short:
A place for your photos and banter. Photog first is our motto

Please refer to the site rules before posting.

Description:
About metalhead.club

Metalhead.club is a microblogging platform - A place where you can exchange short posts with like-minded people about metal and rock or other topics that excite you.

You can follow other users or specific #hashtags to stay up to date on your favorite topics. Numerous filter options allow you to hide content that you don't like.

metalhead.club is part of the decentralized Mastodon network - from here you can also exchange with any other users from the network - no matter on which server they have their account.

On metalhead.club we are mainly connected by our taste in music - but of course you can also discuss other topics ;-)

We are especially proud of the fact that we cover the costs for the technical infrastructure by voluntary contributions - completely without advertising, without selling your data or making crooked deals. A part of the users keeps the project running for everyone.

Our entire infrastructure is powered exclusively by green electricity, so we don't harm the environment unnecessarily.

Curious? Just try it out and register an account for free!

Funding / Donations

This instance is run by Leister IT and 100 % funded by its users. It could not exist without financial contributions by the members. If you like this place, consider participating in the funding of this server. More information about donations: donate.650thz.de

Imprint

Responsible for this instance:

Thomas Leister
Dorfplatz 1 b
85055 Ingolstadt, Germany
E-Mail: mastoadmin@metalhead.club
Phone: +49 157 73804402 NO SUPPORT! Only for judicial purpose!

Terms of use

Metalhead.club server is run and provided voluntarily. There are some rules to make living together peacefully possible. You accept these rules by creating an account on this server.

In general German law applies to this instance, since the service is run in a german datacenter. Violation of these laws will be prosecuted. Additionally the server rules apply.

The provider of this service will remove content at his own discretion if it does not suit a free, peaceful and tolerant world. In this case, the author of the concerning content will be notified.

Downloading user posts from this instance for the purpose of AI training is prohibited.

Community-Guidelines in a nutshell

„Behave nice and respect each other“

metalhead.club logo designed by @calyxWorks

Our "backup admin" is milan@social.tchncs.de
Short: Metalhead.club is a Mastodon instance hosted in Germany and powered by 100% green energy.

Description:
目次

  • 運営ポリシー
    • サードパーティによる広告を設置しないこと
    • 利用者の間のトラブルには介入しないこと
    • 安定した運営を継続させるために
    • 支援者の募集について
  • 利用規約
  • 通報機能について
  • ご支援者の一覧

運営ポリシー

運営チームについて

  • 運営者: @tnzk / 不具合・要望は @tnzk にリプやDMください。

サードパーティによる広告を設置しないこと

利用者のプライバシーを尊重し、サードパーティによる広告は設置しません。

利用者の間のトラブルには介入しないこと

利用者の間でトラブルがあった場合でも、運営者は、その解決のために介入することができません。

安定した運営を継続させるために

やるつもりがあること

支援者の募集: Patreon と FANBOX で、支援者を募集しています。

やるつもりがないこと

  • サードパーティの広告を掲載すること。運営者とも Mastodon とも関係のない広告の掲載はしません。
  • ichiji.social そのものに、有料の機能を実装することはしません。

ichiji.social 通報機能について

私たちの最大の関心事は、「ichiji.social の利用者が、安心して楽しく一次創作にまつわる交流ができる場を維持すること」です。それを妨げるような利用規約に違反している行為を確認した際はアカウント停止などの措置を行います。

しかし、管理者がすべてのトゥートを確認することは現実的に困難なため、利用者の皆さんに協力していただく方法として、「通報」機能を使っていただけますと幸いです。

なお、トゥートの内容に明らかな違反性が見受けられない場合には、運営チームとしてもアカウント停止などの措置に関しましては慎重に行っており、対応が難しい面がございますため、ミュートやブロックなどで各自で対応していただけますようお願いいたします。

また、個々の人間関係に関わる事やichiji.social 以外の場に及ぶ問題につきましても、運営チームでの対応が難しいものとなっておりますこと、ご理解とご容赦の程よろしくお願いいたします。

トゥートやユーザーの通報

ichiji.social の利用規約を破っているトゥート、ユーザーが発生した場合、またはサーバー管理者の注意が必要な場合、トゥートの下に表示されている【 … 】アイコンをクリックし、【通報】からサーバー管理者へ通報ができます。

通報フォームに切り替わったら通報するトゥートを選び、コメント欄へ通報理由・違反内容を記入した上で【通報する】をクリックする事で該当のトゥートとコメントの内容がサーバー管理者へ送信されます

コメント欄へできるだけ詳細に通報理由・違反内容を記入いただくことで適切な処置をとることができますので、ご協力お願いいたします。

通報後の措置について

通報を受け付けた後に対象のトゥート及びユーザーを調査し、ichiji.social の利用規約に違反していると判断された場合、当該アカウント・トゥートに対して下記のような違反の内容に応じた措置を行います。

  • 性的表現に NSFW が設定されていない→【NSFWオン】
  • 創作物ではない悪意のある画像→【メディアを隠す】
  • 特定のアカウントに対して複数人から通報→【アカウントをサイレンス】または【アカウントを停止】

※サイレンス・アカウント停止に関しては、複数人から受け付けた内容全体から判断し、 ichiji.social の利用規約に違反している行為と見受けられた場合に、アカウント停止・サイレンス措置を行う場合がございます。 通報の内容によっては調査に時間が掛かる場合がありますことをご了承下さい。

  • サイレンス：措置を受けたアカウントの投稿は、そのユーザをフォローしていない人から見えなくなり、ローカルタイムラインや連合タイムライン等の公開タイムラインに表示されなくなります。また、サイレンスされたアカウントには、他のサイレンスされたユーザしか見えなくなります。※サイレンス措置を受けた場合でも、サイレンスされたアカウントをフォローしているユーザからは該当アカウントのトゥートが見れます。
  • アカウント停止：停止されたアカウントはプロフィール及び投稿が全て削除され、ichiji.socialの利用ができなくなります。

措置の実施についてはご案内はしておりませんので、サイレンズの状況やアカウントのご利用状況にご不明な点や気になる事がありましたら、運営事務を代行しているフィフス・フロア社のお問い合わせフォームよりご連絡ください。
https://www.5thfloor.co.jp/contact.html

ご支援者の一覧

ご支援者の一覧は次の通りです。金額は非公開ですが、直近6ヶ月間のスポンサーシップ購入金額の合計が大きい順で掲載しています。

※現時点では、「掲載OK」の旨を明記いただいた場合に限り、掲載しております。
※過去のスポンサーシップに関して、お名前の掲載・非掲載を変更希望の方はこちらのメールアドレスまでご一報いただけますと幸いです。

  • オラクルカード企画様
  • あぷちろ様
  • 匿名希望 13名様

(2021年10月28日時点/直近6ヶ月)
Short: 一次創作者たちが安心して交流できる場を作るために開設されたMastodonサーバーです。イラスト・漫画・小説・詩・ゲーム・音楽・映像など、幅広い分野で一次創作をする「作り手」たち、一次創作作品が好きな「読み手」たちのための交流の場を目指しています。
topic: ichiji.social / 一次創作好きのためのMastodonサーバー

Description:
1.アダルト（R18）コンテンツの制限

当サーバーでは、NSFW（メディアの閲覧注意）、CWの付いていないアダルト（R18）コンテンツを認めておりません。

必ず適切に設定をしてください。

2.迷惑行為の禁止

サーバーへの負荷行為、他者への迷惑行為を禁止します。

その他、上記ルールに問わず国内法に反する投稿はすべて投稿削除、アカウント停止対象となります。

Description:
Qdon — 퀴어 친화적 소셜 네트워크

Qdon은 퀴어 친화적인 마스토돈 인스턴스입니다. 퀴어들이 마음 놓고 이용할 수 있는 안전한 공간을 목적으로 개설되었습니다.

이곳은 퀴어 전용 인스턴스는 아닙니다. 퀴어가 아닌 분들도 퀴어라는 이유만으로 차별 받지 않아야 한다라는 명제에 동의하시는 분이라면 누구든지 환영합니다. (아우팅의 위험을 감소시키기 위해 성소수자가 아닌 분들의 가입 역시 필요합니다)

퀴어포비아가 보이면 즉각 신고해주시기 바랍니다. 마스토돈은 트위터와 다르게 인스턴스의 관리자가 외부 유저나 인스턴스 자체를 뮤트하거나 차단할 수 있습니다. (단, 유저가 직접 팔로우 한 경우는 인스턴스에서 뮤트해도 그 유저에게는 적용되지 않습니다) 이를 통해 일부 관리인력의 노력으로 안전한 마스토돈을 만들 수 있습니다.

이용 약관은 /privacy-policy를 확인해 주세요.

  • 큐돈 서버 상태, 2
  • 큐돈 운영 블로그
  • 큐돈 디스코드 서버
  • Onion: http://nqt42rzz5ybtslld3yvfv7orovscbfpylv2aaybqiri6cpql3kxdcpad.onion/

백업 현황:

Q&A

  • 아우팅 위험이 있지 않나요?

    아우팅이 두려우신 분들은 평소 쓰는 닉네임이 아닌 다른 이름으로 가입해 주시고 다른 인스턴스와 같이 쓰는 부계정의 개념으로 쓰셔도 됩니다.

  • 저는 성소수자가 아닌데 가입 해도 되나요?

    성소수자가 아니더라도 환영입니다. 현재로선 아우팅의 문제도 있기 때문에 성소수자가 아닌 분들 역시 필요합니다. 다른 인스턴스들과 다른 차별점이 몇몇 있으니, 부계정으로 가입하시고 구경하시는 것도 환영입니다.

운영 지원

큐돈은 관리자의 자비로 운영 되고 있습니다. 후원을 원하시는 분은 아래의 링크를 이용해 주세요

Become a Patron!

후원자 목록

다음 분들은 큐돈을 정기적으로 후원하는 분들이십니다.

  • Haze Lee
  • yeonboonge(@usagicore)
  • 이은서
  • 인토토
  • 혼술선생

큐돈만의 특징

  • Onion hidden service와의 연동을 지원합니다
  • 관리자는 보안을 중시하며 자체적으로 위험한 부분이 있는지 테스트를 실시합니다
  • 편의를 위한 자체적인 커스텀이 일부 적용 되어 있습니다
    • 한국 주요 서버 유저들 닉네임에 색이 입혀져 보입니다
    • 컬럼 폭이 모니터에 딱 맞게 늘어납니다
    • 이미지 업로드 제한이 완화되었습니다
    • 홈 타임라인 크기가 무제한입니다 (마스토돈은 글 800개 제한)
    • 이외에도 여러가지 숨은 기능들도 있습니다
  • 프라이버시 보호를 위해, 공격적으로 아카이빙 하는 세력에 대해 적극적으로 방어합니다
    • 프라이버시 보호를 위해 Tootdon의 자체 서버에 큐돈의 글은 인덱싱 되지 않도록 요청하였습니다 (툿돈은 사용자와 사용자가 부스트/관심글을 지정하는 글조차 자체 서버에 인덱싱 하여 이용합니다) 툿돈 서비스 종료
    • fedichive.tk 등의 공격적으로 글을 아카이빙하려는 서버/인스턴스로 정보가 새어나가지 않게 합니다
    • archive.is(archive.org와는 다름)의 아카이빙을 차단합니다 archive.is(aka archive.today)는 robots 규약을 전혀 따르지 않고 noarchive 태그또한 존중하지 않으며, 법적인 조치도 거부하기 때문에 차단하기로 결정하였습니다

이용 규칙

Qdon은 호모포비아, 트랜스포비아를 포함한 모든 퀴어포빅 발언에 대해서는 최선을 다해 조치를 취할 것입니다 이용자들은 쾌적한 SNS 환경을 만들기 위해 이용 규칙을 준수해주세요.

권고사항

  • 남들이 보기에 불쾌할 수 있는 이미지나 글은 NSFW, CW 기능을 이용해 주세요.
  • 어떤 것이 싫다고 하는 것을 "공개"설정으로 게시하지 말아주세요. "미등재" 이하의 공개설정을 권합니다.
  • 타임라인대화는 보는 사람이 이해하지 못하고 답답하기만 합니다. 그 글만 읽어도 이해할 수 있도록 문맥을 같이 넣어 주세요. 마스토돈의 글자수 제한은 널널합니다.
  • 자신이 언제든지 틀릴 수 있고 자신도 모르게 혐오발언을 할 수도 있다는 점을 염두해 두세요.
  • Qdon 내에서 혐오발언을 보았을 때 무조건 비난과 욕설부터 할 게 아니라 상대의 무지함 때문이 아니었을 지 한번 생각해 보세요.
  • 특정 키워드만 가지고 혐오자로 낙인을 찍진 마세요. 민감한 사람에게는 단어 사용 자체로도 트리거가 될 순 있지만, 생각하는 그 의도가 아닌 경우도 많습니다.
    • 다른 사람에게 민감할 수 있는 주제는 서로서로 CW 기능을 사용하여 사고를 미연에 방지합시다.
  • 혐오발언이 보이면 직접 대응하지 말고 신고 기능을 적극 이용해 주세요.
  • 특정 인물에 대한 과거를 뒤지기 위해 검색 기능을 악용하지 마세요.
  • 성별을 나눠서 의사소통/팔로우를 제한하는 행위는 큐돈 특성상 많은 사람에게 불편함을 줍니다. 또한 큐돈은 혐오자 및 차별주의자를 강력하게 제지하기 때문에 여기서는 그런 행동이 불필요하다는 것을 알려드립니다.
  • 자해/자살을 실행하려는 움직임이 보일 경우 외부 도움 요청 등을 위해 빠른 신고를 부탁드립니다. 또한, 자살/자해를 남에게 조장하는 경우에도 빠른 신고를 부탁드립니다.

자동화에 대한 규칙

API를 이용해 자동화 봇을 만들 수는 있지만 다음과 같은 규칙을 따라야 합니다.

  • 자동화된 계정의 경우 프로필 설정에서 봇 태그를 활성화 해주세요.
  • 공개제한이 public인 글을 너무 많이 작성하지 마세요. unlisted 글을 권장합니다.
    • 단 본인의 블로그 포스트 링크를 제목, 본문의 일부와 함께 자동으로 공유하는 것은 허용합니다.
    • 정보성 글을 트위터, 페이스북 등의 다른 소셜 미디어와 동시에 포스팅 하기 위한 것도 허용합니다. ＊ 다른 SNS에서 일어난 일에 대한 의견 글이 크로스포스팅을 통해 전달 되는 것은 보는 사람이 문맥을 파악할 수 없다는 것을 명심하세요.
  • 사용자가 먼저 팔로우 하거나 특정 메시지를 주지 않은 경우 먼저 자동으로 팔로우 하지 마세요.

이상의 규칙을 위반하는 경우 경고 후 수정 되지 않을 시, 사용자들에게 피해가 가지 않도록 뮤트 혹은 차단합니다.

필수 규칙은 아니지만 권장사항은 다음과 같습니다.

  • 정보성 글이 아닌 재미 위주의 봇일 경우, 게시물 자동 삭제를 설정해 주세요.
    • 미디어를 올리는 봇의 경우, 다시는 찾아보지 않을 미디어가 서버에 쌓이는 것보다는 오래된 게시물을 삭제해 주는 것이 장기 운영에 건강합니다.
    • 고정된 게시물, 부스트/좋아요 된 게시물에 대해서는 예외설정을 해, 남들이 보관하길 원하는 게시물은 제외하고 잊혀져버린 게시물만 삭제할 수 있습니다.

모더레이션 규칙

큐돈은 쾌적한 SNS를 위해 평화를 해치는 행위에 대해 다음과 같은 규칙을 적용하고 있습니다. 사용자 보호를 위해 모더레이션 기록을 따로 공개하진 않습니다. 규칙에 없는 사항이어도 모더레이터의 판단에 따라 조치가 취해질 수 있습니다. 단, 연합우주 외부에서 일어난 일에 대해서는 조치를 취하지 않습니다.

글 삭제

규칙을 위반하는 글은 이용자와 관리자의 보호를 위해 삭제 될 수 있습니다. 한 계정에서 지속적으로 다음과 같은 행위를 할 시 침묵이나 차단 사유가 될 수 있습니다.

  • 인종차별 / 성차별 / 퀴어포비즘 등에 해당하는 발언
  • 특정 인물에 대한 공격
  • 퍼블릭이 아닌 글을 작성자에게 해를 끼치기 위해 허락 없이 캡처하여 공개하는 행위
  • 동의 없는 개인정보 공개
  • 심한 노출 / 혐오스러운 사진을 CW 없이 업로드
  • 다음 내용들에 대한 내용을 CW 없이 공개(public) 설정으로 게시
    • 우울 및 불안감에 대한 직접적, 구체적인 내용
    • 자살 및 자해에 관한 직/간접적인 내용
    • 사상자가 있는 사건에 대한 직접적인 내용
  • 기타 남에게 불편할 수 있는 글을 "공개" 설정으로 게시

욕설, 비속어의 사용 자체는 규칙 위반은 아니지만 과도한 욕설의 경우엔 CW로 가리거나 미등재 이하의 공개설정을 사용해주시기 바랍니다. 너무 과도한 경우 삭제될 수 있습니다.

침묵

뮤트된 사용자의 글은 홈 타임라인 외에는 보이지 않으며 팔로워가 아닌 사용자에게 어떤 상호작용을 해도 알림이 가지 않습니다.

  • 퍼블릭으로 광고를 올리는 행위
  • 퍼블릭으로 가치가 없는 자동포스팅
  • 타인의 글을 무차별적으로 부스트/관심글 지정 - 당하는 사람 입장을 생각해주세요
  • 타 SNS 사이트의 글을 무작위로 퍼나르는 글

차단/정지

차단된 유저의 글은 저장 되지 않으며 유저와 어떤 상호작용도 할 수 없게 됩니다. 로컬 계정의 경우 계정이 정지되며 30일 이후 모든 데이터가 삭제됩니다

  • TERF 계정의 경우 차단과 함께 로컬 유저일 경우 이메일을 포함한 몇몇 정보를 외부 페이지에 공개합니다
  • 무차별적인 팔로우, 부스트 등의 행위로 관심을 끌려는 광고 계정이나 팔로우 봇
  • 가짜 이메일로 가입을 하는 행위(남을 괴롭히기 위해 계정을 생성하는 것으로 간주합니다)
  • 그 이외에 서비스의 사용 목적을 해치려는 행위
    • 규칙의 모호함을 파고들어 규칙의 의도를 무시하는 행위

기타

트위터 등의 외부 서비스에서 제공하는 내용을 저작자의 동의 없이 무단으로 릴레이 하는 등의 소프트웨어는 경고 없이 침묵/차단 등의 정책이 적용될 수 있습니다.

1년 이상 사용하지 않은 계정은 외부 서버에 대한 팔로우가 정리될 수 있습니다.

Qdon — Queer friendly mastodon since 2017-09-29 12:12:40 KST
Short: 성소수자 친화적인 마스토돈 인스턴스입니다. 성소수자들이 마음 놓고 이용할 수 있는 안전한 공간을 목적으로 개설되었습니다.

Description:
우리.인생에서 새 계정을 만들기 전에 규칙을 꼭 읽고 잘 따라 주세요. 규칙을 지키지 않으면 다른 분들을 보호하기 위해 계정이 정지될 수도 있어요.

봇 관련 정책

우리.인생에서의 봇 계정은 일반 규칙에 더해 아래 규칙도 따라야만 해요.

  • 자신을 팔로우하고 있지 않은 계정을 선제적으로 팔로우할 수 없습니다.
    (로컬에서 정지, 연합에서 정지)
  • 자신이 작성한 콘텐츠가 로컬 혹은 연합 타임라인에서 둘 이상 연달아 노출되도록 게시할 수 없습니다.
    (로컬에서 정지, 연합에서 제한)
  • 자신이 작성한 콘텐츠가 과도하게 성적이거나 폭력적인 내용 등을 담고 있다면, 해당 콘텐츠는 로컬 혹은 연합 타임라인에 노출되도록 게시할 수 없습니다.
    (로컬에서 정지, 연합에서 제한)

에모지 관련 정책

우리.인생에서는 아래 규칙을 따르는 에모지만을 보고 사용할 수 있어요.

  • 시인성이 나쁜 에모지는 사용할 수 없습니다.
    (등재 불가, 볼 수 있음)
  • 밝은 배경 또는 어두운 배경에서 알아보기 힘든 에모지는 사용할 수 없습니다.
    (등재 불가, 볼 수 있음)
  • 큰 그림을 쪼갠 형태의 에모지는 사용할 수 없습니다.
    (등재 불가, 볼 수 있음)
  • 손실 압축으로 인해 노이즈가 발생한 에모지는 사용할 수 없습니다.
    (등재 불가, 볼 수 있음)
  • 점멸하는 에모지는 사용할 수 없습니다.
    (등재 불가, 볼 수 없음)
  • 광과민성 증후군을 야기할 가능성이 있는 에모지는 사용할 수 없습니다.
    (등재 불가, 볼 수 없음)

만약 우리.인생에 자신의 커스텀 에모지를 추가하고 싶다면 우리.인생 커스텀 에모지 신청서를 작성해 보세요.

언어 관련 정책

우리.인생에서는 어떤 언어를 사용하든 관여하지 않지만 공지사항을 포함한 모든 공식 창구와의 소통에는 대한민국의 한국어만 사용할 수 있어요.

국가 및 법령에 관한 부록

우리.인생은 아래 국가법의 영향을 받습니다.

  • 대한민국 (대한민국)
  • 독일연방공화국 (Bundesrepublik Deutschland)
  • 아메리카합중국 (The United States of America)
  • 핀란드 공화국 (Suomen tasavalta; Republiken Finland)
Short: 우리.인생(uri.life)은 다툼과 차별, 혐오에 지친 나와 여러분, 우리를 위한 안식처입니다.

Description:
muenster.im

Dieser Mastodon Server ist hauptsächlich für Menschen aus Münster, solche, die sich mit Münster verbunden fühlen, Münster mögen oder Münster verbessern möchten. Natürlich kann sich aber jedes Wesen hier anmelden. Chatraum: <https://matrix.to/#/#muenster:okaris.de>

Finanzierung

muenster.im wird privat betrieben, kostenlos und werbefrei zur Verfügung gestellt. Wer sich an den Kosten für Hardware und Energie beteiligen möchte, kann das tun:

  • PayPal: thomas@kleinhitpass.de
  • LiberaPay: liberapay.com/Thomas

muenster.im ist ein privates Hobbyprojekt von Thomas Klein-Hitpaß, daher gibt es keine Garantie auf Verfügbarkeit.

Momentan gibt es drei Moderator:innen und weil hier so nette Menschen wohnen, reicht das im Moment auch. Wir moderieren streng jeden Hass und Fehlinformation, auch intensive Werbung möchten wir hier nicht. Wir wünschen uns, dass die lokale Timeline wirklich von Menschen gefüllt wird, die dann auch häufiger münsteraner Themen besprechen.

Status
Short: Aus Münster für Münster und für alle anderen netten Menschen.

Description:
Overview

This instance is aimed at scientists, researchers, science students, science communicators, future-scientists, or anyone with a rational mindset wanting to interact with each other and to help share your perspectives with the wider Fediverse.

So come here to tell us about your research, ask questions, answer questions, and to share ideas and stories with like-minded folk. The federated nature of the network will also help to spread your sciencey know-how and enthusiasm with the rest of the Mastodon network!

About Scicomm.xyz

We have a dedicated site where you can read about:

  • our rules and code of conduct
  • answer common questions
  • how to get an account here
  • how to donate towards running costs
  • where to find a moderator

For all the above, go here:

https://about.scicomm.xyz
Short: An instance for scientists, researchers, science students, communicators, and enthusiasts! Please visit https://about.scicomm.xyz for details.
topic: A community for scientists and science communicators.

Description:
Topics: game development and many related fields. We do all we can to make everyone interested in game development feel at home on this instance.

Code of conduct: gamedev.place/mastodon-coc.html. TLDR: be a sensible, nice human being. Harassment, insults, bigotry etc won't be tolerated.

Usage guidelines: gamedev.place/mastodon-guidelines.html. TLDR: it's mostly about game development. Preferred language is English.

This instance is ran by @aras; let me know if you have any issues or suggestions, or see inappropriate activity. Server costs are on me, and I'm not looking for help there right now.
Short: Mastodon server focused on game development and related topics.

Description:
Please visit our info site at https://info.tech.lgbt/ for more detailed instance information.

*Due to increased bot signup, manual approval is required. Please write some applicable request text on signup with why you want to join. Submissions that fail to do so will be denied.*

We welcome all marginalized identities. We are explicitly anti-racist, anti-queerphobic, and anti-transphobic. This Mastodon instance is generally for folks who are LGBTQIA+ and Allies with an interest in tech work, academics, or technology in general.

Attributions

Props to @malle_yeno@tech.lgbt for the Mastodon art!

This instance uses Mutant Standard emoji, which are licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International License.

Blobhaj emoji by @heatherhorns@plush.city.

Blobfox emoji by Volpeon.

Baba emoji by @ShadowJonathan, adapted from assets from the . Baba is You fandom wiki, under CC BY-SA.

Cybre Heart Emoji by @minty_da@cybre.space

Doom guy emojis by @katnjiapus.

Queer cats, fire, flags, hearts by Zoë Bijl.

Neorat

PICMO, gifted to the server for free by the creator.

Code of Conduct

Short Version

We try to handle moderation ASAP, but we may not see reports for several hours. We will get to all reports though!

We're not a free speech absolutist, and there are instances available for that. We're not interested in Nazis, TERFS, or hate speech of any sort, which we will define at our sole discretion as moderators. No homophobia, transphobia, queerphobia, racism allowed.

This instance is meant to be a friendly, welcoming space to all who are willing to reciprocate in helping to create that environment.

Long Version

The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of tech.lgbt; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

  1. The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:
    1. Excessive advertising
    2. Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources
    3. Untagged nudity, pornography and sexually explicit content, including artistic depictions
    4. Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence, including artistic depictions
  2. The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:
    1. Racism or advocation of racism
    2. Sexism or advocation of sexism
    3. Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof
    4. Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism
  3. The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:
    1. Sexual depictions of children
    2. Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism
    3. Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism
  4. Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:
    1. Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.
    2. Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.
    3. Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

Content Warnings and Sensitive Media

Our Content Warning (CW) policy is intended to make our server comfortable for our community. We are not trying to silence our community or police discussion, but ask that you consider those who may read your posts when making them.

Content Warnings are a feature of Mastodon that enable you to hide the body of a "toot" (post) behind a line of text. The intended use of this feature is to provide a way to discuss sensitive and/or potentially harmful topics without causing duress or harm to anyone who might stumble upon it, though content warnings may be used for a wide variety of reasons.

Images can be marked as sensitive. This is a feature which hides an image until a warning banner is clicked. Images may be marked as sensitive separately from Content Warnings, though using a Content Warning automatically marks the toot's images as sensitive.

Please note that our sensitive media rules apply to profile photos and headers as well. Since those images cannot be hidden behind sensitive media warnings, they are not allowed to contain content from enforced content warnings.

We cannot enforce content warnings on users from other instances, but can help to manage content that you see when reported to instance moderators.

Please be clear and accurate when labeling content warnings, to ensure that they follow both the letter and spirit of the enforcements that we have.

Above all, try to be polite, and come from a place of mutual respect when discussing content warnings with other. We do not condone tone policing, and want to promote healthy discussion in our community.

This cannot ever be a complete list, and so we want to keep it semi-general, and reserve the right to use the judgement of the moderation team to make decisions in the future.

  • Enforced Content Warnings:
    • NSFW/sexual discussion and imagery must be behind descriptive CWs (nudity, sex, kink discussion, etc)
    • Sensitive imagery (please use your best judgement on what content that most other users would find sensitive, such as photos of surgeries, abuse, war, deceased individuals, etc)
  • Suggested Content Warnings:
    • Discussion of overtly political (relating to elected or unelected government officials) topics
    • Triggering topics (direct discussion of rape, trauma, abuse, suicide, transphobia, homophobia, etc). The intention is to provide a warning for users who may not want to consume this content, not to silence users who are sharing their negative experiences.
    • Drugs or drug use
    • Advertisements for corporations
    • "Rage" posts and posts using mainly capital letters
  • Suggested Sensitive Image Marking
    • Eye contact images
    • Food related images

CryptoCurrency/NFTs

We do not allow the promotion, advertisement, or sale of cryptocurrencies on our instance. Mentioning the existence of cryptocurrencies, linking personal accounts or addresses, and otherwise discussing them in a way that is not intended to sell or advertise a specific cryptocurrency is acceptable. We do not have any association with any cryptocurrency or other monetary transactions that happen within the server.

We do not allow the promotion, advertisement, or sale of NFTs on our instance. We do not allow content from our instance, including content and media uploaded by our community members, to be sold as NFTs.

Staff

This instance is administered by the team of:

  • @david
  • @ShadowJonathan
  • @sudaksis

Moderation support is provided by the hard working team of:

  • @bluestarultor
  • @deejunfazed
  • @diffrentcolours
  • @err931
  • @ItsCryptic
  • @juni
  • @murderofescrows

If you would like to directly contact our moderation team, we have an account at @mods, and can be reached via email at mods@tech.lgbt

Legal

DMCA (Digital Millennium Copyright Act) Notice

As required by the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 (17 U.S.C. 512 (c)), all notifications of copyright infringement regarding content hosted on tech.lgbt should be sent ONLY to its designated agent.

Wolfinger Law, LLC
4509 Bee Ridge Road Sarasota, FL 34233
dmca@tech.lgbt

Funding

This instance is funded in part by Patreon and Liberapay donations.

Blocked Instances

We maintain a blocklist of instances that we do not federate with. If you believe that an instance should be added to this list, please contact an admin or moderator.

For privacy and safety of our community, we do not comment on most instance blocks that we have in place. We have recently begun sharing details on major/oft commented moderation decisions via @mods@tech.lgbt

The list is visible for logged-in members under the section Moderated servers below. While we understand that not publishing this list for non-members is not fully transparent, we are not trying to scare off potential new members who want to ensure that their friends are not blocked. The only nefarious intent here are those who have used this information when public to harass individuals and the instance as a whole. Bluntly, if those are the people that you want to interact with, you should probably join their instance instead.

This page most recently updated on 20 February 2024
Short: We welcome all marginalized identities. This Mastodon instance is generally for folks who are LGBTQIA+ and Allies with an interest in tech work, academics, or technology in general.

Description:
주의 사항

플래닛에서는 다음과 같은 사항들을 금지하고 있어요.

  • 이러한 미디어나 Toot을 CW와 적절한 경고 없이 로컬 타임라인에 올리지 말아주세요.
    • 지나친 성적 / 폭력 묘사
    • 광과민성 발작을 일으킬 수 있는 미디어
    • 그 외 다른 사용자들이 불쾌감을 느낄 수 있는 과격한 내용의 미디어 / Toot
  • 다른 사용자를 모욕, 괴롭힘, 사칭, 명예훼손등의 목적으로 계정을 만들거나 Toot을 올리면 안되요.

만약, 위 사항과 관련해서 경찰의 수사 협조 요청이 온다면 그에 응할 수 있어요. 정보 제공 내역은 공개될 거에요.

자동화 / 봇 계정에 관해서

스크립트 등으로 Toot을 올리는 등의 자동화된 계정 (봇이라고 할게요) 은 사용할 수 있어요. 다만, 아래의 사항들을 지켜주세요.

  • 봇이 올린 Toot은 로컬 타임라인에 올라오면 안 돼요. (공개 범위를 전체 공개(Public)로 하지 말아주세요)
  • 봇은 맞팔로우를 제외하고 다른 사용자를 찾아다니며 자동으로 팔로우하면 안 돼요.
  • API 요청이 너무 많아서 서비스에 지장을 줄 수 있다 판단되면 접속이 차단될 수 있어요.

생성형 AI 관련

플래닛의 모든 데이터는 저작자의 명시적인 동의를 받지 않고서는 AI 학습에 사용할 수 없어요.

또한, 생성형 AI를 이용해 제작한 컨텐츠를 업로드할 경우에는 반드시 명시해야 해요.

이러한 사항들을 위반한다면 계정이 정지될 수 있어요.

기타

커스텀 이모티콘 신청은 여기서 하실 수 있어요.

플래닛에서의 팔로우, 부스트, 좋아요 등을 하는 행위는 그저 그 행동 자체만을 의미해요. 동의나 지지, 기타 등등의 의견을 의미하지 않아요.

플래닛은 아직 성장중이에요! 아직 부족한 점들이 많을 수 있으니 건의할 사항이 있다면 언제든 @planet@planet.moe로 알려주세요!
Short: 서브컬쳐 향유자들을 위한 한국어 마스토돈 인스턴스, 플래닛이에요.

Description:
自我介绍　Instance Introduction

一个萌萌哒 泛ACGN Mastodon 实例，讨论主题不限，欢迎安家 ~
　
A cute instance focusing on ACGN topics, open for discussions of all kinds.
　
We're a vibrant community where discussions aren't limited by topic – everyone is welcome to make this their home!

　
[ 中国語注意 / If you don't like Chinese toots, please don't join in. ]
　
We primarily communicate in Simplified Chinese,
but don't worry, Japanese and English are also welcome!

　
Please note, accounts solely dedicated to pornography and news bots,
kindly register on other instances, thank you.

　

社区氛围　Community Rules

  • 拒绝真人不雅内容
    No inappropriate real-life content.
  • 不参与三次元键政，包括转嘟
    Avoid real-world politics, including Boost.
  • 禁止发送 违反香港法律 的内容
    Don't post anything illegal in Hong Kong.
  • NSFW 图片，须标记为 “敏感内容”
    Mark NSFW images as "Sensitive".
  • NSFW 内容，使用 “CW” 功能折叠
    Fold NSFW content with "CW" option.
  • 谢绝 无意义刷屏，广告推送 类用户注册使用
    Discourage meaningless spamming, advertising, and solicitation.
    New user registrations for such purposes are not welcome.
  • 尊重他人，勿引战，勿发表攻击性言论
    Be respectful, no trolling or aggression.

　
个人头像、资料页横幅不得使用 NSFW 图片
Personal avatars and profile banners must not contain NSFW images.
　
呜呜的文字上限为 20000 字，但发送公开长文必须使用 "CW" 折叠
The text limit per post is 20,000 characters.
However, any public long posts must be folded using "CW".
　
请勿滥用实例媒体资源服务，禁止引用图片、视频外链至站外
Please do not abuse the instance's media resources,
such as linking images or videos externally.

　
严管儿童色情，发现封号删除
可以发送二次元萝莉萌图，但不允许真人儿童色情
如果是推图 bot，必须标记敏感内容，包括正常图片
　
Strict measures against child pornography are in place.
Accounts found engaging will be banned and deleted.
　
Posting anime-style lolicon images is permitted,
but real-life child pornography is strictly prohibited.
　
If operating a bot for image sharing,
you must mark sensitive content, including regular images.
　
第一次违反上述规则将隐藏用户，并在收到第二次举报时停用用户
用户被停用登录后，所有用户数据将在3天后永久删除，请及时导出存档
　
A first violation of the above rules will result in the user being hidden,
and upon a second report, the user account will be suspended.
　
Once a user is suspended,
all user data will be permanently deleted after three days.
　
Please export your data timely.

　

服务节点　Service Nodes

捐助呜呜 / Donate
https://mk.wxw.best (Powered by Stripe)
　
服务状态 / Node Status
https://stats.wxw.fail (Powered by UptimeRobot)
　
Hong Kong 56C 56G 1000M
(Powered by Akari Networks, https://akari.net, https://idc.do)
　
媒体位于 Wasabi (us-west-1)，优化线路反代加速
Media stored on wasabi(us-west-1) with Cloudflare.

　

稳定程度　Service Stability

如无突发情况，关站会提前三个月通知。
非盈利项目，无 DDoS 防护，没有 SLA 保证，但会尽量维持在线。
　
This is a non-profit project.
　
Unless unexpected situations arise,
the closure of the site will be announced three months in advance.
　
We do not have DDoS protection nor SLA guarantees,
but we strive to maintain online availability as much as possible.

　

滥用举报　Abuse Reporting

如果用户在 wxw.moe 上以未经授权的方式使用受版权保护的内容，
版权所有者可以向 abuse@wxw.moe 发送 DMCA 删除通知，
以要求更改或删除侵权内容。
　
If a user on wxw.moe uses copyrighted content without authorization, the copyright owner can send a DMCA takedown notice to abuse@wxw.moe to request the modification or removal of the infringing content.
　
我们将停用并永久删除屡次违反此规定的用户。
　
Users who repeatedly violate this policy will be suspended and permanently deleted.
Short: 一个 泛ACGN 实例，讨论主题不限 ~

Description:
Chinwag provides Australian-based free and open social networking and communication tools.

We have no purpose in life other than providing people with the ability to communicate with other people on a secure, open and equal footing.

Our general usage policy is fluid but well-summarised by "don't be a dick". Management is fairly relaxed but if your purpose in life is to make other people miserable then you can piss off somewhere else, or even better, just stop posting.

Be respectful. Take it easy. Have some fun. Don't make me come over there.
Short: Consider this place your friendly, local Australian pub. Make yourself at home, bring your friends, have a good time! Meet new people, have a laugh, enjoy the ambience, and the Oxford commas.

Description:
Chapril est un projet de l'April. Une fois votre compte créé, vous pouvez notamment vous abonner au compte de l'April (l'abonnement au compte admin de cette instance étant automatique).

Les frais du Chapril (notamment hébergement des serveurs) sont pris en charge par l’April. Vous pouvez nous soutenir en faisant un don ou en devenant membre de l'association.
