Description:
There is no such thing as a safe space. We exist in the real world and we all carry scars and have caused wounds. This space seeks to turn down the volume of the world outside and amplify the voices that have to fight to be heard elsewhere. This space will not be perfect. It will not always be what we wish it to be, but it will be ours together and we will work on it side by side.

Moderation guidelines

  • English click twice to go to the section
  • Français cliquez deux fois pour vous rendre à la section

Rules

  1. Hateful conduct: We do not permit any form of bigotry or hateful ideology, including but not limited to: fascism/nazism, racism, misogyny, homo/trans/queerphobia, antisemitism, ableism, as well as threats against marginalised communities or the “debate” of theirs right to a safe existence.
  2. Harassment: We do not permit harassment, including but not limited to: insults, bullying, dogpiling/brigading, bad faith trolling (“sealioning”), or boundary violations (for instance non-consensual flirting or unsolicited nudes). Requests to terminate conversations are to be respected.
  3. Safeguarding: We do not permit content that endangers others, such as others’ personal or identifiable information (“doxxing”) or the sharing of private conversations without consent. Promoting or encouraging self-harm or suicide will not be permitted.
  4. Sexual Content: Sexual content, such as erotic nudity or pornography, may be shared behind a content warning. Sexual content may not be shared on public timelines.
  5. CSAM/Abuse: Sexualised depictions of children, real (“child porn”, child sexual abuse material) or fictional (“lolicon”, “shotacon”), as well as sexual content shared without consent (reposting, “revenge porn”), are not permitted and will be removed.
  6. Misinformation: We do not permit the promotion of misinformation and conspiracy theories. Impersonating persons or organisations is not permitted, with the exception of parody.
  7. Spam: We do not permit spam, including but not limited to: excessive automated/identical posting, unsolicited off-topic replies, corporate advertisement, excessive/unsolicited promotion, crossposting on the public timelines. Bot accounts are not permitted unless administrators’ exceptional approval.
  8. Illegal content: This instance is hosted in France and subject to French law. As such, any content illegal in France may be removed without prior warning.
  9. Be nice: Mutual respect and kindness are strongly encouraged. Unprompted aggression may be dealt with as needed on a case-by-case basis. For the same reason, content warnings for common triggers are heavily encouraged, and may be required at the team’s discretion.

The administration and moderation team reserve the right to remove content and discipline accounts at their discretion for reasons not or not yet listed in these rules. Attempts to find loopholes permitting harassment, such as wording bigotry politely, will not be tolerated and dealt with in best judgement.

Moderation

In order for us to be able to process your reports as well as possible, please use the reporting feature of the software. If necessary, we also process reports by message to the administration account or by email to our contact address.

The instance’s moderation is taken care of voluntarily by the administrators and the moderators. They enforce the above rules. To that end, they are free to use all the tools at their disposal.

Administrators

  • milia
  • Sylvhem

Moderators

  • amberage
  • crowdagger
  • guerrillarain
  • lexiemaki
  • louizzz
  • sous_mon_masque

Credits

Artworks

This instance’s logotype is an original creation of AirDur.

This instance’s thumbnail is an original creation of Plumy.

Emojis

This instance uses several emojis created by Dzuk for Mutant Standard. They are all licenced under CC BY-NC-SA 4.0.

The emoji is a creation of Dzuk in memory of Natalie Nguyen and is on the public domain.

The emoji is a creation of Lena.

The and emojis are a creation of Fream.

The and emojis are a creation of Miruku_P.

The autumn’s leaves and the tentacles emojis are creations of _lila*.

The prides hearts emojis are creations of CAMERATA#4771.

Blobhaj emoji set by Heatherhorns is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License.

This instance uses several emojis created by Volpeon for Neocat and Neofox. They are all licenced under CC BY-NC-SA 4.0.

Legal notices

This instance is an only communication service published in a non-professional capacity, as defined by the French law n°204-575, article 6,III,2°. According to the law, if we prefer to stay anonymous, personal informations about us have been transmitted to our host, Fedi Monster.

Règles

  1. Conduite haineuse : Nous ne permettons l’expression d’aucune forme d’intolérance ou d’idéologie haineuse. Ceci inclut, de manière non-exhaustive : le fascisme/nazisme, le racisme, la misogynie, l’homophobie/transphobie/queerphobie, l’antisémitisme, le validisme ainsi que toute menace contre des groupes marginalisés ou tentative de « débattre » de leurs droits à une existence paisible.
  2. Harcèlement : Nous ne tolérons aucune forme de harcèlement, ce qui comprend entre autres choses : les insultes, les tentatives d’intimidations, l’incitation au harcèlement, les invitations à débattre répétées et de mauvaise foi et la violation des limites d’autrui (comme, par exemple, flirter avec une personne non-consentante ou envoyer des nues non-sollicitées). Toute demande de mettre fin à une conversation doit être honorée.
  3. Mise en danger : Nous n’autorisons pas la diffusion de contenu qui pourrait mettre une tierce personne en danger. Ceci inclut, sans pour autant y être limité, le partages d’informations personnelles sur autrui ainsi que la publication de conversations privées sans le consentement des personnes impliquées. Promouvoir ou encourager l’automutilation et le suicide est interdit.
  4. Contenu sexuel : Le contenu à caractère sexuel, tel que la nudité érotique et la pornographie, est autorisé du moment qu’il est placé derrière un avertissement et n’est pas publié sur les fils publics.
  5. Abus sexuel : Le partage de contenu pédopornographique, réel ou fictionnel, est interdit et tout contenu de ce type sera supprimé. Il en est de même pour le contenu à caractère sexuel partagé sans l’autorisation des personnes impliquées.
  6. Désinformation : Il est interdit de propager de la désinformation et des théories du complot. Se faire passer pour une organisation ou une personne tierce est également interdit, excepté dans un but parodique.
  7. Spam : Nous n’autorisons pas le spam, ce qui comprend mais n’est pas limité : à la publication excessive de messages identiques, aux réponses hors-sujet et non-sollicitées, aux publicités, aux campagnes promotionnelles envahissantes et à la publication automatique sur les fils publics depuis un autre média social. Les robots logiciels ne sont pas autorisés, sauf en cas d’accord exceptionnel des administratrices.
  8. Contenu illégal : Cette instance est hébergée en France et sujette aux lois françaises. À ce titre, tout contenu illégal en France est susceptible d’être supprimé sans avertissement préalable.
  9. Soyez gentil·le·s : Le respect mutuel et la gentillesse sont des comportements fortement encouragés. L’agressivité gratuite pourra faire l’objet de sanctions si nécessaire. Pour la même raison, l’utilisation d’avertissements pour les sujets sensibles les plus courants est encouragée et pourra être requise par l’équipe si elle le juge utile.

Les équipes d’administration et de modération se réservent le droit de supprimer du contenu et de sanctionner des personnes à leur seule discrétion, y compris pour des raisons non-listées dans les règles ci-dessus. Toute tentative d’y trouver des failles permettant le harcèlement, par exemple en tournant un message haineux poliment, ne sera pas toléré et fera l’objet d’une réaction appropriée.

Modération

Pour que nous pussions traiter aux mieux vos signalement merci de privilégier la fonctionnalité de signalement du logiciel. Le cas échéant nous traitons aussi les signalements par message au compte d'administration ou par email à notre adresse de contact.

La modération de l’instance est assurée bénévolement par les administratrices et les modérateur·rice·s. Elles et ils sont chargé·e·s d’appliquer les règles énoncées plus haut. À cette fin, ils et elles sont libres d’utiliser l’ensemble des outils à leur disposition.

Administratrices

  • milia
  • Sylvhem

Modérateur·rice·s

  • amberage
  • crowdagger
  • guerrillarain
  • lexiemaki
  • louizzz
  • sous_mon_masque

Crédits

Illustrations

Le logotype de l’instance est une création exclusive d’AirDur.

La vignette de l’instance est une création exclusive de Plumy.

Émojis

Cette instance utilise plusieurs émojis créés par Dzuk pour Mutant Standard. Ils sont tous distribués sous la licence CC BY-NC-SA 4.0.

L’émoji est une création de Dzuk, réalisée en hommage à Natalie Nguyen et placée dans le domaine public.

L’émoji est une création de Lena.

Les émojis et sont des créations de Fream.

Les émojis et sont des créations de Miruku_P.

Les émojis représentant des feuilles d’automne et des tentacules sont des créations de _lila*.

Les émojis représentant des cœurs aux couleurs des drapeaux des fiertés sont des créations de CAMERATA#4771.

La collection d’émojis Blobhaj de Heatherhorns est sous licence Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License.

Cette instance utilise plusieurs émojis créés par Volpeon pour Neocat and Neofox. Ils sont tous distribués sous la licence CC BY-NC-SA 4.0.

Mentions légales

Cette instance est un service de communication au public en ligne édité à titre non professionel au sens de l’article 6,III,2° de la loi n°204-575 du 21 juin 2004. Conformément à loi française, si nous avons préférées rester anonymes, nos éléments d’identification personnelle ont été transmis à notre hébergeur, Fedi Monster.
Short: Une instance se voulant accueillante pour les personnes queers, féministes et anarchistes ainsi que pour leurs sympathisant·e·s. Nous sommes principalement francophone.

Description:
Tämä on kuvaus instanssin sisällöstä ja ohjeistus sen käytössäännöistä. Niiden on tarkoitus kertoa, miten tämän palvelimen sisältöä hallinnoidaan. Lopullinen tulkinta säännöistä on aina ylläpitäjillä.

Tämän lisäksi ylläpitäjät voivat tarvittaessa milloin tahansa sulkea yksittäisen käyttäjän tilin, jos hän häiritsee jollain tapaa palvelua tai muita ihmisiä.

1. Ei mainostamiseen tarkoitettuja tilejä.

Mastodontti.fi ei ole tarkoitettu influenssereille, tuotteille tai yrityksille. Viestien lähettäminen korvausta vastaan (ns. kaupallinen yhteistyö) on kielletty.

Tämä ei tarkoita, etteikö keskustelussa saisi mainita yrityksiä tai tuotteita, kunhan siitä ei saa korvausta. Oman yrityksensä tai omien tuotteiden maininta on sallittua, kunhan se ei ole tilin ainoa tarkoitus. Tarvittaessa moderaattorit arvioivat tämän.

2. Ei botteja.

Tällä palvelimella ei sallita automatisoituja tilejä, eli botteja. Niitä varten on oma instanssinsa, https://botsin.space/.

3. Ei pornografista, seksuaalista tai ylettömän väkivaltaista sisältöä.

Pornografinen ja seksuaalinen sisältö on kielletty. Alastomuus on sallittu, mutta se tulee piilottaa sisältövaroituksen taakse.

Liiallinen väkivaltainen sisältö on kielletty. Esimerkiksi: todellisia terroritekoja kuvaava väkivaltainen sisältö, teloitusvideot yms. Moderaattorit arvioivat tarvittaessa, mikä on liiallista.

Tämän lisäksi muu väkivaltainen sisältö tulee piilottaa sisältövaroituksen taakse.

4. Palvelimella ei sallita rasismia, seksismiä, transfobiaa, tai muuta vähemmistöön kohdistuvaa syrjintää.

Rasismi, seksismi, transfobia, antisemitismi tai muu vähemmistöön kohdistuva syrjintä on kielletty ja voi johtaa tilin pysyvään sulkemiseen.

5. Palvelimella ei sallita Suomessa laittomia asioita.

Kaikki Suomen lakeja rikkova sisältö, kuten lasten seksuaalinen kuvaus, on palvelimella kielletty ja johtaa tilin sulkemiseen ja käyttäjän raportointiin poliisille.

6. Ei häirintää, doksausta, valheellisen tiedon levittämistä tai muina esiintymistä.

Muiden käyttäjien häirintä, palvelun toimintaa häiritsevä käytös, ja muu toiminta joka haittaa muiden käyttäjien käyttökokemusta on kielletty. Tällaisia asioita ovat muun muassa:

  • Viestien lähettäminen käyttäjälle sen jälkeen, kun tämä on pyytänyt keskustelun lopettamista tai muiden käyttäjien kehottaminen tällaiseen käytökseen.
  • Muiden käyttäjien yksityistietojen levittäminen.
  • Salaliittoteorioiden, disinformaation tai muun valheellisen tiedon levittäminen.
  • Esiintyminen jonain muuna henkilönä, jos kyse ei ole parodiasta. Parodiatilit tulee merkitä selvästi ja yksiselitteisesti sellaisiksi.
  • Kuvakaappauksien levittäminen muiden käyttäjien viesteistä ilman, että merkitsee kyseistä käyttäjää viestiin, tai muuten häiritsemistarkoituksessa.

7. Mastodontti.fi on tarkoitettu aikuisille ihmisille, ei organisaatioille tai yhteisöille.

Mastodontti on tarkoitettu pääasiassa ihmisille. Voit luoda palvelimelle tilin yhteisöllesi, yrityksellesi tai organisaatiollesi, mutta ensimmäisen esittelyviestin jälkeen kaikki viestit tällaiselta tililtä tulee lähettää niin, että ne eivät päädy paikalliselle aikajanalle, esimerkiksi lähettämällä ne listaamaton julkinen -asetuksella. On sallittua puhua edustamiensa organisaatioiden asioista, kunhan tili ei edusta vain tällaista organisaatiota.

Mastodontti.fi on tarkoitettu vähintään 16 vuotta täyttäneille.

Lisätietoja

Tämän instanssin teknisestä ylläpidosta vastaa Mastohost ja sen palvelimet sijaitsevat EU-alueella Ranskassa.

Tämän instanssin ylläpito sitoutuu varoittamaan käyttäjiä vähintään kolme kuukautta ennen instanssin mahdollista sulkemista. Tätä ennen instanssille pyritään kuitenkin löytämään uusi ylläpitäjä.

Käyttäessäsi tätä Mastodon-instanssia hyväksyt sen käyttöehdot.

Tällä instanssilla on käytössä Suomi-emojit. Niitä käytetään Nimeä-EiKaupallinen-EiMuutoksia 4.0 Kansainvälinen (CC BY-NC-ND 4.0) -lisenssillä.
Short: Tämä on ihmisille tarkoitettu suomenkielinen Mastodon-instanssi, jota moderoidaan aktiivisesti.

Description:
Tabletop Social

We are an inclusive Mastodon community for everything tabletop (& more). We welcome everyone that wants to be part of the community, boardgamers, RPG players, casual gamers, party gamers, hobbyists, LARPers, game designers and publishers, RPG characters, artists, writers, vlogers, podcasters, reviewers, streamers, lego builders and more.

This is meant to be a positive and safe space for people to enjoy each other's ideas, opinion and have fun. To keep tabletop.social that way, the Code of Conduct, Rules and Etiquette will be applied and enforced thoroughly, see below.

Rules and Etiquette

Welcome! Please feel free to join us here, but if you do know that we ask everyone to keep a few things in mind. The following list is not exhaustive, and will be modified and expanded over time. Look, if you get it and you you're good with it, great. If you don't get it, figure it out - we can help! If you don't want to get it, maybe find somewhere else to hang your hat.

Be you

This is a space to celebrate our diversity. Here you don't need to be a brand, be true to yourself and let others do the same.

Cultivate a Safe Atmosphere

Harassment will not be tolerated, oppressive behavior will not be tolerated, and while failure to recognize the boundaries of others may be met at first with a gentle attempt to educate you, repeated failure will not be tolerated.

Share Things

Talk about what you are up to! Talk to other people about what they are up to! Make things! Share you patreon! Post your art! Bots welcome (see below)!

Self Promotion

Have a have patreon, a gumroads, a kickstarter on the go? Is it your main source of income? We get it and encourage you to share these.

What we don't want the local timeline to be is an endless stream of self promotion. Please follow the guidelines.

On Marketing

We allow brands, we allow games accounts, but for its social function, not to exploit it for some other purpose. Company and game accounts are treated similarly to bots and you need to follow the guidelines.

Bots Guideline

Mastodon has different 'timelines' that different people can see - the Local Timeline is a timeline everyone in this community can see. You post to it by choosing 'Public' (the globe icon) in your post toolbar.

We really want our Local Timeline to be an antidote to traditional social media posting; a more down to earth place where people talk about themselves and what they're up to.

Follow the guidelines.

Banal Bullshit Unwelcome

There's nothing interesting about homophobia, transphobia, racism, ableism, sexism or any of the other unexamined default settings some people grow up with. Being a nazi isn't an opinion, it's shitty and aggressively boring - take it somewhere else. You can feel free to disagree somewhere else where none of us have to hear you. Enforced strictly.

Standing on the Shoulders of Giants

Rules, Etiquette, Bots, block list

We are very thankful to other community like weirder.earth and sleeping.town and the people running them.

They allow people to use their extensive rules, policies and hard gained knowledge about unsafe communities out there.

We mostly follow blockchain's blocklist.

Art

The lovely art that represent this instance was made by the ever so talented Dona!

Emojos

This community uses Mutant Standard emoji from Caius Nocture, which are licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International License.

Custom Theme

The fluffy friends (under the compose toot) and profile picture from @host@tabletop.social are from Famine and under the same license as Tootsuite/Mastodon: GNU Affero General Public License v3.0

@host@tabletop.social Branding

See above for the avatar

The header is from darklavendrvoid

Favicon

Favicon is "Hexagon by RULI from the Noun Project".

Other Space

Tabletop.social is where we hope you'll enjoy spending time. We welcome main accounts and alternative accounts. If you only have one account on the fediverse, we highly suggest that you create a secondary account/alternative account somewhere else as a backup.

Here is a list of community that are relevant to the hobby

  • Ten Forward
  • The Wandering Shop
  • Dice Camp
  • Ludosphere
  • Rollenspiel Social
  • Warhammer Social
  • PeopleMaking.Games
  • Aux Portes de l'Imaginaire
  • Tabletop.VIP

Moderation

The current moderation is done by 4 (four) people. Allow 24 hours for answers, actions and replies .

To report a toot, click the "3" dots menu and click report. It will allow you to select one or more toot. You'll also be able to add a note for the moderators to see.

We are always looking for help to moderate this community, we would appreciate people from different background, life experience and geographies.

To do so and improve bias, we will favor people that are not cis, hetero, white, man, European. To apply send a DM to @host@tabletop.social, the process is not formalized and might take a while.

We have a page that gets a little more specific about this that you should take the time to read if you're thinking of joining. You can read it here .

Tabletop.social does not allow collection of its data using the API or through any other means for research, marketing, model building, search engine; unless opt-in has been specifically given by host@tabletop.social
Short: We are an inclusive Mastodon community for everything tabletop (and more).

The OutsourcedMath Social site has the intention of hosting content relevant to services offered by Outsourced Math LLC now or in the future. However, any math, social justice, economics, or even political topics are welcome.

Currently it's just focusing on finance for the non-financial savvy.

Description:
hey hello!

welcome to the tildeverse, a digital community of linux servers for socializing, learning, and making cool stuff

this instance is hosted by tilde.team. stop by and sign up if you want to make some cool stuff with us :)

file uploads are limited to 200mb.

pinafore is available as an alternate client

please see the terms of service

have fun and be nice!

if you have a few spare bucks, you can send em over to @ben via liberapay, my fosspay, or directly to my stripe page. thanks!

server status page can be found here: status.tilde.zone. maintenance updates are usually posted on @ben's account.

there's a #tilde.zone channel on tilde.chat for chatter and outage checks. i'll post updates in the topic there.
Short: mastodon instance of the tildeverse, a collection of small public access *nix systems for collaboration, creativity, and socializing. a proud part of the small internet.

Description:
Hello Friend 👋

Warmest welcome to all new users! It is all about people - Follow people, make new friends, connect with old ones. toot.io is a fast and reliable Mastodon instance running since 2018. You can sign-up and use it for free!

Funding 💸

Mastodon hosted by toot.io offers hosting services to cover the costs of this instance. Yes, you can have your own Mastodon instance. We give a portion of the net revenue to the Mastodon developers on an ongoing basis.

We don't sell your data to advertisers or other third parties. There are no ads. If you enjoy toot.io and find it useful, you can donate here: Patreon. Many thanks!

Moderation 🎤

To reach mods please use the Mastodon reporting feature.

Spam Prevention ✅

Preferably use the Mastodon verification feature. https://joinmastodon.org/verification

Code of Conduct ℹ️

The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of toot.io; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

  1. The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:
    1. Excessive advertising
    2. Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources
    3. Nudity, pornography and sexually explicit content, including artistic depictions
    4. Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence, including artistic depictions
  2. The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:
    1. Racism or advocation of racism
    2. Sexism or advocation of sexism
    3. Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof
    4. Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism
  3. The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:
    1. Sexual depictions of children
    2. Content illegal in Germany and/or Japan
    3. Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism
  4. Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:
    1. Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.
    2. Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.
    3. Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

When you'll sign up, you'll be following a few accounts by default. But you are free to follow and unfollow anyone!

THIS INSTANCE'S DATA WILL NOT BE SOLD OR TRADED OR WHATEVER.
Short: toot.io is a fast, mainly english-speaking Mastodon instance.

Description:
(English information located here.)

Sobre a instância

Colorid.es é uma instância com foco queer/LGBTQIAPN+. Qualquer pessoa pode fazer uma conta aqui, mas não se surpreenda ao encontrar poucas pessoas hétero, cis e perissexo. Levamos nossas regras a sério; por favor, leia todas as nossas regras antes de fazer sua conta.

Colorid.es é principalmente para pessoas que falam português, mas pessoas que não falam português ou que vão postar em múltiplas línguas são bem-vindas!

Incluímos pessoas queer, intersexo, transgênero, não-binárias, de orientações multi, heteroflexíveis, do espectro assexual, do espectro arromântico, de atração fluida, xenogênero, poligênero, do espectro agênero, que não são hétero por conta de sua orientação sensual/queerplatônica/alternativa, astroidianas, asterianas, cujos gêneros são influenciados por culturas/crenças/experiências de vida, entre outras, como parte da comunidade. Seu ódio por elas não é negociável independentemente de sua identidade, e resultará em banimento.

Se você quer uma introdução melhor à instância e ao Hometown, confira sobre.colorid.es!


Nossas regras

0. A moderação da instância possui o direito de deletar qualquer brilho/toot/tute (postagem) ou conta, ou de silenciar/bloquear qualquer instância, se percebermos que estão causando mais mal do que bem à comunidade.

  • Isto se aplica principalmente a quando as regras abaixo são quebradas, mas também se aplica a casos não previstos nelas.

1. Tudo o que for contra a lei brasileira é proibido aqui.

2. Tudo o que for postado será de responsabilidade de cada postadore. Detalhes:

  • Caso outra pessoa faça uma infração pela sua conta, é você quem deve ser cuidadose da próxima vez.
  • Caso haja alguma infração legal, a responsabilidade não é da equipe do site.
  • Caso você faça algo contra as regras em outra conta desta instância, sua conta ainda pode ser punida.

3. Atitudes preconceituosas ou propositalmente irritantes não serão toleradas. Detalhes:

  • Há um limite entre perpetuar algum preconceito por acidente por ser a atitude padrão da sociedade e entre insistir que tal atitude é inofensiva/"senso comum".
  • Há um limite entre fazer perguntas e insistência em não entender porque algo é nocivo a um certo grupo de pessoas.
  • Há um limite entre fazer uma brincadeira sem saber que alguém se incomodaria e entre insistir na brincadeira porque é só uma brincadeira.
  • Há um limite entre querer se expressar e entre postar repetidamente mensagens curtas e/ou repetitivas e essencialmente sem conteúdo novo. Se quiser ficar fazendo spam, use a opção para postagens não listadas, ou opções de postagens privadas.
  • Mesmo que não seja em relação a uma opressão/discriminação existente, aparente ou conhecida, tente não julgar pessoas por comportamentos "estranhos", "ridículos" ou "infantis" quando isso não te afeta. Casos extremos disso podem levar a ações da moderação.
  • Também evite fazer julgamentos superficiais sobre grupos que você não conhece, especialmente em postagens públicas feitas de forma assertiva. Isso pode acabar sendo visto como discriminação, mesmo que o grupo não sofra opressão sistêmica.

4. Evite brigas. Detalhes:

  • Caso alguém esteja agindo mal, argumente sem depender de insultos vagos, bloqueie e/ou denuncie.
  • Mesmo que algum lugar tenha tomado decisões ruins em relação a uma pessoa ou grupo, aqui não é o lugar de organizar "invasões" contra outros espaços.
  • Caso alguém exponha algum canal de comunicação de uma pessoa problemática, não pense que é uma boa ideia enviar mensagens com sugestões violentas para a pessoa. Caso seja descoberto que tais mensagens venham desta instância, é possível que ações sejam tomadas contra isso na instância.
  • Evite fazer indiretas provocativas a pessoas ou grupos em postagens nas linhas do tempo públicas e/ou sem avisos de conteúdo.

5. Utilize o aviso de conteúdo quando necessário. Conteúdo que precisa de aviso inclui:

  • Política (no sentido de eleições e de decisões governamentais)
  • Sangue/violência
  • Conteúdo sexual ou com conotação sexual
  • Abuso, bullying, suicídio, perseguição, eugenismo e outras situações negativas que pessoas podem querer evitar ler/ver imagens sobre, especialmente por conta de experiências passadas com isso
  • Postagens sobre epidemias, pandemias e desastres naturais (ou eventos físicos perigosos não naturais) atuais ou recentes
  • Discussões ou menções de incesto
  • Experiências negativas com discriminação (racismo, capacitismo, misoginia, diadismo, heterossexismo, cissexismo, exorsexismo, monossexismo, antissemitismo, xenomisia, de classe, contra profissionais do sexo, contra não-monogamia, etc.)
  • Álcool/drogas
  • Spoilers de mídia que foi lançada nos últimos 7 dias:
    • Caso a mídia em questão seja jogo eletrônico, filme, episódio de série, reality show, novela ou desenho, livro/texto/vídeo/áudio de ficção ou que contenha alguma história real que pode ser "estragada" caso contem o desenvolvimento ou o final: colocar aviso de conteúdo de spoiler é necessário;
    • Caso a mídia em questão seja anúncio, publicação acadêmica, programa/artigo jornalístico, livro didático, notícia, ou texto, vídeo, imagem ou áudio com fins informativos que não tenha alguma história que possa ser "estragada" caso contem seu desenvolvimento ou o final: aviso de conteúdo de spoiler não é necessário, a não ser que tal mídia faça referência a algo do item anterior;
    • Caso o conteúdo se encaixe em ambos ou em nenhum dos itens acima, use o bom senso. Talvez seja bom deixar o conteúdo dentro de aviso de conteúdo, caso você não tenha certeza.

Não é necessário utilizar avisos de conteúdo para outros tipos de conteúdos ou assuntos, mas recomendamos que os utilizem sempre que perceber que outras pessoas possam não querer engajar com o conteúdo das suas postagens, ou querer conhecimento prévio de seus conteúdos antes disso.

Para provar que você leu as regras, coloque a sequência de símbolos $*@ em algum lugar de seu pedido de aprovação de conta.

6. Caso você queira fazer uma conta completamente automatizada ("bot"), que seja apenas para anúncios/propaganda, ou cujo conteúdo principal pode estar "em cima da linha" do que é permitido ou não, por favor contate a administração com antecedência, para que possamos indicar o que você pode ou não pode fazer.

7. Não roube conteúdo, e respeite as vontades des artistas. Detalhes:

  • Caso alguém não queira ter seu conteúdo repostado, não reposte-o.
  • A não ser que o conteúdo esteja explicitamente marcado como algo que é permitido repostar sem crédito (como conteúdo de domínio público), cada citação de livro/música, vídeo, imagem (incluindo avatar/cabeçalho), arte ASCII, etc. precisa ter indicação de crédito, como um link para o perfil de artista, o nome de artista/do trabalho ou um link que credita e artista pelo trabalho postado, a não ser que ele seja seu.
  • Caso algume artista peça para ter sua arte removida de suas postagens ou do seu perfil, você deve obedecer o pedido.

Especificações em relação a questões envolvendo menores de 18 anos

Menores de 16 anos não devem se registrar em colorid.es.

Os seguintes conteúdos (os quais já devem estar marcados com avisos de conteúdo segundo a regra 5) não podem receber interações de menores de 18 anos, com a exceção de denúncias caso quebrem alguma regra:

  • Postagens detalhando ou mostrando atos sexuais;
  • Postagens detalhando ou mostrando detalhes de taras e fetiches;
  • Postagens discutindo parafilias;
  • Postagens discutindo relacionamentos íntimos fictícios ou históricos envolvendo adultes e menores de idade com mais de 3 anos de diferença entre a parte mais velha e mais nova, independentemente do teor da postagem ou da falta de conteúdo explícito;
  • Postagens discutindo, detalhando ou mostrando atos de estupro, tortura ou outras formas de violência pesada.
Além disso:

  • Independentemente da idade de quem está por trás da conta ou do aviso de conteúdo na postagem, conteúdo que erotiza menores de 18 anos não pode ser postado nesta instância;
  • Mencionar contas de menores de idade em postagens inapropriadas ou mandar links de tais postagens para elus é uma ação proibida;
  • Se um conteúdo estiver marcado como restrito a uma faixa etária mínima (ex.: 18+), seja uma conta que pede certa idade para acompanhar ou uma postagem com um aviso do tipo, isso deve ser respeitado;
  • Por conta da moderação ser composta por maiores de 18 anos, nenhum conteúdo em colorid.es pode ser completamente restrito a menores de idade. Caso alguém seja menor de idade e não queira interação nenhuma com pessoas adultas, terá que ir para outro servidor.


A moderação de colorid.es não tem como monitorar que postagens são lidas ou não, mas queremos cultivar uma comunidade responsável com o próprio consumo de conteúdo. Por isso, esperamos que nosses usuáries adolescentes demonstrem a responsabilidade de respeitar os limites descritos aqui.



Instâncias com regras completamente diferentes das nossas podem ser bloqueadas. Porém, se as regras tiverem pequenas divergências (como alguns dos itens sob a regra do que precisa de aviso de conteúdo), as instâncias podem não ser bloqueadas. Tenha cautela ao navegar na linha do tempo global. Mais informações aqui.


Nossa equipe

  • @QueerNeko (admin)
  • @Aster (admin)
  • @shadow (mod)

Informações financeiras

As despesas de colorid.es consistem em:

  • Um domínio .es pago anualmente (US$ 10,99);
  • Um servidor pago mensalmente (US$ 63,60);
  • Uma doação mensal de US$ 4,50 para Jortage, onde fica nossa mídia.

É possível contribuir com estas despesas das seguintes formas:

  • Benfeitoria (somente doações mensais)
  • Ko-fi
  • Chave Pix: 0df54758-3aa5-4def-8194-5a900c99d1c7 (somente pro Brasil)

Créditos

  • Vários dos emojis desta instância têm como base recursos de Pride-Flags e edição feita por @Aster (muitas vezes com a ajuda de imagens base de domínio público).
  • O símbolo gênero-fluxo não foi retirado de Pride-Flags, e sim desse Tumblr. (Versão arquivada)
  • Este servidor usa alguns emojis do conjunto Mutant Standard (https://mutant.tech/), que estão licenciados sob uma licença internacional Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 (https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0/). Também usa outros emojis feitos por Dzuk.
  • Emoticons do MSN são... do MSN... e eu achei eles aqui. Dei uma modificada pra tirar/suavizar bordas extras de alguns.
  • Alguns emojos foram feitos por @lena@glitch.social.
  • Vários dos emojos de jogos e ícones são da instância elekk.xyz, eu acho? Os sobre boosts serem permitidos ou não vêm de lá também.
  • Corações de orgulho com brilhos e duplos foram feitos por adhdlynera no Tumblr. Links aqui e aqui. Certos corações com brilhos e alguns dos corações sem brilhos foram feitos por pahwahp, também no Tumblr. E mais corações e emojis de orgulho extras foram feitos por shippyprincess no Tumblr.
  • Bandeiras dos estados e de festa junina, comidas típicas, e algumas outras coisinhas por @abacaxi@masto.donte.com.br
  • A maioria des gates de orgulho com olhos de coração por acelaurakinney no Tumblr.
  • "Fuck off" por @jh4c@kitty.town.
  • Os emojis para artistas/criadories LGBTQIAPN+/queer são daqui, daqui e daqui.
  • Alguns emojos de vários tipos por @Alexis@beepboop.one. Esses também. Assim como outros.
  • O emoji de grão de sal foi modificado a partir da foto Salt por Kevin Dooley, que está liberada sob a licença CC BY 2.0.
  • Emojis de pronomes em inglês, e alguns outros, foram feitos por @metapianycist@queer.party. Alguns links: [1] [2] [3]
  • Mood por @pebbles@toot.lynxpebbles.me.

  • Rizoma (imagem , código :rhizomes:) é uma expressão de apoio que não possui conotações românticas, de toque ou específicas a certo grupo. A ideia e a imagem possuem sua origem aqui.
  • Um dos nossos emojis de JoJo foi feito com base em um GIF de takazugi, disponível aqui. Vários outros são edições originais de Aster.
  • Alguns dos nossos emojis de She-Ra foram desenhados por MarMarkarp no Imgur (link original aqui). Outros foram editados por Aster a partir de screencaps desta wiki.
  • Aster também editou screencaps disponíveis nesta wiki de The Owl House para fazer emojis.
  • Emojis de One Piece foram feitos pela comunidade do Telegram One Piece ES.
  • Alguns emojis de Pokémon vieram daqui e daqui.
  • Emojis de Sonic e companhia usam sprites diretos dos jogos que foram disponibilizados aqui.
  • Emoji de infinito marrom (o que representa pessoas racializadas neurodivergentes) e de blobcat olhando intensamente segurando café foram feitos por @evel@mastodon.art.
  • Koo pegando fogo (:kooonfire:) por @thiago@cuscuz.in.

  • Alguns dos emojis foram pegos do Twitter e do Neopets.
Não sei quem fez os outros emojos, mas adoraria dar crédito se pudesse!

  • Purple Haze*
  • Meemu Roxo* & Meemu Vaporwave
  • Flamingo*

  • Pôr-do-sol foi feito e é mantido por @Aster, mas também usa um pouco de código de Flamingo (colunas maiores) e de Monsterpit (Open Sans)

Créditos do código modificado:

@QueerNeko - opção de privacidade não listada + local, configuração de visibilidade de formatação de texto, limite de caracteres em nome/bio/toots, tamanho personalizado de emojis

Glitch-soc - Esconder mídia dentro de avisos de conteúdo

Customized Mastodon da Kibousoft - A maior parte do BBCode disponível aqui

Mastodon fork for the Computer Fairies instance - Recebimento do código [color] de outras instâncias, BBCode [url]

Como selecionar imagens sem descrição para diferenciar sua aparência

Utilizamos Jortage para nossa hospedagem de mídia.



About this instance

Colorid.es (from colorides, "colorful people") is an instance focused on the queer/LGBTQIAPN+ community. Anyone can make an account, but don't be surprised if you encounter few het, cis and perisex people here. We take our rules serioulsy, so please read that section before making an account.

Also, this is an instance primarily for Portuguese speakers. People who don't speak Portuguese or who will also speak in other languages are welcome, though, as long as our moderation team can handle it!

We include people who are queer, intersex, transgender, nonbinary, multi-oriented (m-spec), heteroflexible, asexual spectrum, aromantic spectrum, fluid, xenogender, polygender, agender spectrum, non-het regarding sensual/alterous/queerplatonic orientation, astroidian, asterian, non-cis because of culture/belief/life experience, and others in the community. Your hatred for them is not tolerable regardless of your own identity, and will result on a ban.

This instance's moderation team has the right of deleting any toot (post) or account, if we notice it's causing the community more harm than good. See the rules to know more.

If you don't think this instance is for you, take a look at this list or this one to find other good servers.


About Mastodon

Don't know what Mastodon or the Fediverse are? Check out these guides:
  • What Is Mastodon? (And Why You, A Leftist, Should Be On It)
  • Toot How-To: Intro to Mastodon
  • Federated Sites
  • Mastodon 101: A Queer-Friendly Social Network You’re Gonna Like a Lot
  • Mastodon instances, and the ones I recommend
  • delve’s Mastodon Resource List



Our rules

0. This instance's moderation/administration staff reserves the right to delete any toot (post) or account, and the right to block/silence any instance, if we decide those are doing more harm than good to the community.

  • This usually applies to posts/users/instances that break the following rules, but may also apply to cases which are unaccounted for.

1. Anything against Brazilian law is not allowed here.

2. Everything posted by you is your responsibility.

  • If someone else goes against the rules on your account, you are the one who should be more careful next time.
  • If you post anything that's against the law, this is not the responsibility of colorid.es' staff.
  • If you do anything against the rules of this instance on another account, your account may still be punished.

3. Bigoted and/or annoying attitudes won't be tolerated.

  • There is a limit between contributing to oppression on accident because of society's default views and insisting on contributing to oppression because you think certain opinions are "not a big deal" or "common sense".
  • There is a limit between asking questions and insisting on not understanding why something is bad to a certain group of people.
  • There is a limit between joking around without knowing someone could get offended and insisting on "joking around" because "it's not serious".
  • There is a limit between wanting to express oneself and posting many repetitive and/or short messages with essentially no new content. If you want to spam, use the private or unlisted options.
  • Even if it doesn't have to do with known kinds of discrimination/oppression, try not to judge people for "strange", "ridiculous" ou "childish" behavior when it doesn't affect you. Extreme cases of this may lead to moderation action.
  • Also avoid making superficial judgements about groups you barely know about, particularly in assertive Public posts. They may end up counting as discrimination, even if the groups in question aren't systemically oppressed.

4. Avoid fights.

  • If someone is acting in bad faith, argue without resorting to vague/baseless insults, block the person and/or report them.
  • Even if somewhere else someone made bad decisions regarding a person or group, here is not the place to plan "raids" against other spaces.
  • If someone exposes a way to communicate with someone that did something problematic, don't think it's a good idea to send messages with violent suggestions to them. If such messages come from this instance, we may take action against this on here.
  • Please avoid negatively subposting without content warnings and/or in Public posts about people or groups that could see your post.

5. Use content warnings when necessary. Content that needs labeling includes:

  • Politics (as in elections and government decisions)
  • Blood/gore/violence
  • Sexual content or content with sexual connotations
  • Abuse, bullying, suicide, stalking, eugenicism and other negative situations people may want to avoid reading or seeing images about, especially because of their own past experiences
  • Discussions or warnings about epidemics, pandemics and natural disasters (or other similar dangerous events such as fires) that are ongoing or in recent memory
  • Discussion or mentions of incest
  • Negative experiences regarding discrimination (racism, ableism, misogyny, dyadism, heterosexism, cissexism, exorsexism, monossexism, antisemitism, xenomisia, classism, whoremisia, against non-monogamous people, etc.)
  • Alcohol/drugs
  • Spoilers regarding media that has been out for less than 7 days:
    • If such media is a videogame, a movie, an episode of a reality show/cartoon/series, a book/text/video/audio which contains a fictional or real story that may be "spoiled" if someone tells its development or ending: content warnings for spoilers are mandatory;
    • If such media is an ad, an academic publication, a journalistic article/show, or a video/text/audio/image that's meant to be informative and that doesn't contain any story that may be "spoiled" if its development or ending is told: content warnings for spoilers aren't needed, unless such media spoils something that applies to the item above;
    • If such media doesn't fit either or fits both of the descriptions above, use common sense. And if you still aren't sure, maybe put the content inside a spoiler content warning anyways.

It's not mandatory to use content warnings for other kinds of contents or subjects, but we recommend using them as much as you think it's worth it. See what other people content warn, for instance.

To prove you've read the rules, put $*@ somewhere in your account approval request.

6. If you want to make an account with the purpose of posting automated content ("bot"), advertising or other kinds of "borderline against the rules" content, please contact the staff beforehand, so we can tell you how you can proceed.



7. Don't steal content, and respect artists'/creators' wishes. Details:

  • If someone doesn't want their content to be reposted, don't repost it.
  • Unless the content is explicitly marked as something that doesn't need attribution (such as public domain content), every book/song citation, video, image (including avatar/header), ASCII art, etc. needs to be credited, either by a link to the artist's profile, a link to somewhere that properly attributes the content or by citing an artist's name and/or the work's name, unless the work is your own.
  • If an artist asks you to remove their art from your profile or avatar, you'll have to remove it.

Regarding interactions with/from users below 18 years of age

Those below 16 years of age should not make accounts at colorid.es.

The following content (which should already be properly labeled and warned/filtered according to rule 5) must not be interacted with by users below 18 years of age:

  • Posts detailing or showing sexual acts;
  • Posts detailing or showing kinky/fetishistic acts;
  • Posts discussing paraphilias;
  • Posts discussing intimate relationships between adults and non-adults involving fictional or historical parties where the age gap is over 3 years between the oldest and the youngest party, regardless of the post being about explicit content or not;
  • Posts discussing, detailing or showing acts of rape, torture or other kinds of heavily violent acts.
Furthermore:

  • No matter the age of whoever is behind the account or whether the content is properly warned for or not, erotic content involving anyone below 18 is not allowed on this instance;
  • Mentioning accounts of users below 18 in inappropriate posts or sending links to such posts is not allowed;
  • If content is marked as restricted to a certain age (such as 18+), regardless if it's a content warning on a post or an account, this boundary must be respected;
  • Since our moderation team doesn't have anyone under 18 years of age, no content in colorid.es can be completely restricted to minors. If someone is a minor and doesn't want interactions from any adult at all, we recommend not making an account on this server.

Our moderation team can't track which posts are or aren't read, but we want to have a community that's responsible about one's own consumption of content. Because of this, we hope our teenage users demonstrate maturity and responsibility by respecting the boundaries established here.



Instances with completely different rules than ours may be blocked. However, slight rule differences (with regards to content warnings for certain things, for instance) may be tolerated. Be careful while navigating the global timeline.


Our staff

  • @QueerNeko (admin)
  • @Aster (admin)
  • @shadow (mod)

Financial information

This is how much colorid.es costs to maintain at the moment:

  • US$ 10,99/year for the .es domain;
  • US$ 63,60/month for the server;
  • A US$ 4,50/month donation for Jortage (where our media is).

It's possible to help us maintain the instance by donating at:

  • Benfeitoria (monthly donations only)
  • Ko-fi
  • Pix key (Brazil only): 0df54758-3aa5-4def-8194-5a900c99d1c7

Tips

  • Hints & Tips for getting started on alternative social media
  • Make sure you have a pronoun set on your bio and/or introduction post!
  • Make sure you pin your introduction post, so people may know you better before they decide if they want to follow you or not!
  • Check out emojos.in to see a list of our custom emojis!

Description:
Update December 14th 2022: Registration is closed after reaching our maximum user count.

What is Sunbeam City?

Sunbeam City (or SBC for short) is a young cooperative of individuals whose mission is to promote what we believe to be the values of the solarpunk movement. Part of what we do includes running services that are open to everyone, away from the control of profit-seeking, centralized corporations. We lead by example through using democratic decision-making and sharing resources to run these services.

Our current admins are:

  • Wakest
  • squeaky pancakes

Our current mods are:

  • Kevlar

Our current wiki maintainers are:

  • squeaky pancakes

Our Tech team is:

  • Username
  • squeaky pancakes
  • Kawaiipunk

What are these services?

We currently run:
  • A wiki that serves as a solarpunk knowledge bank
  • This Mastodon instance!

How do I join SBC?

Ask for an invite!

Sunbeam City is ran by a cooperative. If you would like to join in the decision-making process, you can sign up for membership by paying a contribution, which helps cover costs of the cooperative's activities. Members of the cooperative use OpenCollective to raise funds.

If you're curious, we have information about the cooperative and how to sign up on our wiki. If you'd like any help, just join our chatroom or contact the instance admin by DM or email (see top-right)
Short: Sunbeam City is a anticapitalist, antifascist solarpunk instance that is run collectively.

Description:
Information

This instance is proudly hosted on Hetzner in Germany. Good stuff. If you need to contact an administrator, send a DM to @dean or email the email address listed above.

The character limit on this instance is 8,192 characters, and the file size limit is 50M. Please be responsible with large uploads as they get cached on other instances too, we recommend that large files should be uploaded to a file host and linked in your post.

The domain is registered through Porkbun as of 2021-05-11.

The CDN provider for this instance's media is BunnyCDN with the US, EU, and AP zones active. Traffic from Russia and China gets rerouted to the cheapest node.

The main website used to be proxied through CloudFlare, but proxying was disabled on 2020-06-10. We plan to move DNS from CloudFlare to Hurricane Electric DNS or another provider eventually.

This instance does not federate with hidden service instances (aka. Tor instances).

Rules

These rules are very basic and only serve as a guide. Administrators reserve the right to delete your account or content posted by your account at any time for any reason they see fit to the extent permissible by law.

All content is stored in Germany on Hetzner dedicated servers, and as such you must conform to Germany's laws and Hetzner's policies.

  1. No illegal (in Germany), harmful, offensive, or fraudulent content.
  2. No content in support of National Socialism (aka. Nazis).
  3. No copyrighted content or content that misappropriates the IP of others.
  4. No viruses/malware/computer harming things.
  5. No child pornography or jail bait.
  6. No accounts for the sole purpose of advertising, scraping, or spamming. This includes corporate accounts (exceptions may apply, you may ask over email before signing up).
  7. No automated/bot accounts that post pornography (porn bots from other instances are not blocked, but they are not permitted to sign up locally).

Additionally, any NSFW content that is not marked sensitive (images) or does not have a content warning attached (text) is not tolerated. Please report NSFW toots that are not censored, or any content that you feel doesn't belong on this instance.

Automated accounts are accepted as long as they follow the above rules. Please be extra careful with bots that may automatically post NSFW content.

The rules were last updated 2022-11-30: added rule blocking corporate accounts.

Blocked Instances

We do not block other instances unless they were made specifically for things like data scraping and spam, or are centered around unwanted content (i.e. illegal content, violence).

We do not reject media from other instances unless a high volume of unwanted media originates from them.

A list of current blocked instances and rejected media instances (with reasons) can be found in the Moderated Servers section on this page. If you would like an entry added to or removed from this list, please contact an administrator.

Decisions are made on a per-instance basis as per the administrator's discretion.

Mastodon Version

This instance strives to run the most recent stable version of Mastodon (not prereleases) with a few quality-of-life patches:

  • Character limit increased from 500 to 8,192.
  • Posts from muted accounts appear in lists.
  • "Hide bots" and "Hide sensitive bot posts" options added to local and federated timelines.
  • Bot profiles do not appear in the profile directory.
  • Sensitive bot posts do not appear on public timelines unless you are logged in.
  • Content-Security-Policy allows script-src 'unsafe-eval' 'unsafe-inline' (performed through NGINx).

We will update this instance within a week after a new Mastodon release. You can find out what version this instance is running at the bottom of this page (the about page).

We do not guarantee to always be running the latest version. Sometimes we forget to upgrade, or there's a bug preventing us from upgrading. You can contact an administrator if the instance is running outdated software for more information.
Short:
A public Mastodon instance run by the same people who run owo (the file sharing website).

Everyone is welcome... as long as you like to uwu.

Description:
Socel is a place for animation professionals, freelancers, independents, students, and fans to connect and grow together. Everyone in related fields are also welcome.

Funding

Socel is funded entirely by its members for the benefit of everyone. Please consider contributing to our operating costs: https://ko-fi.com/socel

Copyright Notice

Socel, LLC respects the intellectual property rights of others. Per the DMCA, we will respond expeditiously to claims of copyright infringement on the Site if submitted to our Copyright Agent as described below. Upon receipt of a notice alleging copyright infringement, We will take whatever action it deems appropriate within its sole discretion, including removal of the allegedly infringing materials and termination of access for repeat infringers of copyright protected content.

If you believe that your intellectual property rights have been violated by us or by a third party who has uploaded materials to our website, please provide the following information to the designated Copyright Agent listed below:

  • A description of the copyrighted work or other intellectual property that you claim has been infringed;
  • A description of where the material that you claim is infringing is located on the Site;
  • An address, telephone number, and email address where we can contact you and, if different, an email address where the alleged infringing party, if not we, can contact you;
  • A statement that you have a good-faith belief that the use is not authorized by the copyright owner or other intellectual property rights owner, by its agent, or by law;
  • A statement by you under penalty of perjury that the information in your notice is accurate and that you are the copyright or intellectual property owner or are authorized to act on the owner's behalf;
  • Your electronic or physical signature.

Socel, LLC may request additional information before removing any allegedly infringing material. In the event we remove the allegedly infringing materials, we will immediately notify the person responsible for posting such materials that we removed or disabled access to the materials. We may also provide the responsible person with your email address so that the person may respond to your allegations.

Pursuant to 17 U.S.C. 512(c). Socel, LLC designated Copyright Agent is:

Jonathan Bailey CopyByte 3157 Gentilly Blvd Suite # 2254 New Orleans, LA 70122 Phone: 1-504-356-4555 Email: socel-dmca@copybyte.com

Ownership

Socel, LLC, 1207 Delaware Ave, #959, Wilmington, DE 19806, U.S.A.
Short: Socel is a place for animation professionals, freelancers, independents, students, and fans to connect and grow together. Everyone in related fields are also welcome.

Description:
Instance rules

Adapted from the mastodon.social Code of Conduct

Please note that the rules below should not be considered a legal document and may be interpreted by the moderation team of tooting.ch as they see fit. This is only an overview which provides you with the general moderation policies you'll have to expect when using this instance.

Offenses against the rules can generally be categorized as one of the following:

  • Minor offenses
  • Moderate offenses
  • Major offenses

Minor offenses

Minor offenses will be handled by removing the content in question, hiding sensitive content behind a content warning or issuing a warning to the offending user. The risk of facing consequences like account suspension after one minor offense is very low.

The following list is an (incomplete) list of actions that count as a minor offense:

  • Nudity, pornography or other explicit material without content warning ( or CW) and appropriate description
  • Gore or extreme violence without content warning and appropriate description
  • Excessive advertising, be it manual or automated
  • Uncurated cross-posting from third-party sources such as news sites

Moderate offenses

Content that counts as moderate offense will lead to removal of the offending content. Additionally, depending on the circumstances, further actions that range from a warning to account suspension are likely to be taken.

  • Racism or advocation of racism
  • Sexism or advocation of sexism
  • Discrimination against minorities of any kind or advocation thereof
  • Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism or advocation thereof
  • Stalking or harassing other users or encouraging others to do so
  • Doxing, that is, aggregating, posting or spreading a user's private data, or encouraging others to do so, without their express permission
  • Brigading or dogpiling, that is, continuously engaging another user in conversation or discussion after said user has asked for this engagement to stop

Major offenses

If content is classified as a major offense, it is removed and leads to an immediate suspension of the offending account. Furthermore, the account holder will be reported to the authorities if appropriate and applicable.

  • Explicit depictions of children
  • Content illegal in Switzerland, such as hate speech
  • Promotion of the ideology of national socialism
  • Impeding other users' access to or degrading the performance of this instance or the attempt thereof

Règles d'instance

Adapté du code de conduite de mastodon.social

Veuillez noter que les règles ci-dessous ne doivent pas être considérées comme étant légales et peuvent être interprété par l'équipe de modération de tooting.ch comme ils l'entendent. Ceci n'est qu'une vue d'ensemble qui vous fournit les politiques générales de modération auxquelles vous devrez vous attendre lors de l'utilisation de cette instance.

Les infractions aux règles peuvent généralement être classées dans l'une des catégories suivantes:

  • Infractions mineures
  • Infractions modérés
  • Infractions majeures

Infractions mineures

Les infractions mineures seront traitées en supprimant le contenu en question, cacher un contenu sensible derrière une mise en garde sur le contenu ou l'émission d'un avertissement à l'utilisateur fautif. Le risque de faire face à des conséquences telles que la suspension du compte après une infraction mineure est très faible.

La liste suivante est une liste (incomplète) d'actions qui comptent comme un délit mineur:

  • Nudité, pornographie ou autre matériel explicite sans avertissement de contenu ( ou CW) et description appropriée
  • Sang ou extrême violence sans avertissement de contenu et description appropriée
  • Publicité excessive, qu'elle soit manuelle ou automatisée
  • Poster tout et n'importe quoi de sources tierces telles que de sites d'actualités

Infractions Modérée

Le contenu qui est considéré comme une infraction modérée entraînera la suppression de l'élément offensant. De plus, selon les circonstances, d'autres mesures allant d'un avertissement à la suspension du compte sont susceptibles d'être prises.

  • Racisme ou plaidoyer pour le racisme
  • Sexisme ou plaidoyer pour le sexisme
  • Discrimination à l'encontre des minorités de toute nature ou plaidoyer en faveur d'une telle mesure
  • nationalisme xénophobe et/ou violent ou plaidoyer de celui-ci
  • Parler ou harceler d'autres utilisateurs ou encourager d'autres utilisateurs à le faire
  • Doxing, c'est-à-dire agréger, afficher ou diffuser les données privées d'un utilisateur, ou encourager d'autres personnes à le faire, sans leur permission expresse
  • Brigading ou dogpiling, c'est-à-dire, engager continuellement un autre utilisateur dans une conversation ou une discussion après que ledit utilisateur a demandé que cet engagement s'arrête

Infractions majeures

Si le contenu est classé comme une infraction majeure, il est supprimé et entraîne la suspension immédiate du compte fautif. En outre, le titulaire du compte sera signalé aux autorités, s'il y a lieu.

  • Des représentations explicites d'enfants
  • Contenu illégal en Suisse , tel que les discours de haine
  • Promotion de l'idéologie du national-socialisme
  • Limiter l'accès d'autres utilisateurs dégrader les performances de cette instance
Short:
Instance Mastodon suisse pour les personnes de suisses et hébergée par l'association FairSocialNet | 
Swiss Mastodon instance for people of Switzerland hosted by the FairSocialNet association.

Description:
Nutzungsbedingungen

Die nachfolgenden Regeln werden mit der Erstellung eines Kontos akzeptiert und gelten für sämtliche Dienste, die unter der Domain „social.anoxinon.de“ angeboten werden.

Dieser Dienst ist ein Ort, an dem Menschen unterschiedlicher Herkunft und Art zusammenkommen. Wie überall müssen daher gewisse Regeln gelten, deren Einhaltung durch uns überwacht wird.

Oberstes Gebot soll die gegenseitige Rücksichtnahme sein. Die Tatsache, dass dies ein öffentlicher Internetdienst ist und man sich nicht physisch gegenübersteht, entbindet nicht von den Grundregeln menschlichen Zusammenlebens und einem Mindestmaß an Benehmen.

Bedenke: Jeder Beitrag wird im Fediverse (Öffentlich, an Follower:innen oder an Einzelpersonen je nach Einstellung) veröffentlicht. Also denke nach bevor du etwas teilst!

1. Allgemeines

Alle Verstöße oder Aufrufe zum Verstoß gegen deutsches Recht sind untersagt und werden geahndet.

Unsere Moderationsrichtlinien sowie weitere Informationen könnt ihr im öffentlichen Codeberg-Repository Organisation einsehen.

2. Beiträge

2.1) Beiträge mit rassistischen, illegalen, pornografischen oder gewaltverherrlichenden Inhalten sind strengstens untersagt. Unter diese Regel fallen auch Avatare und Verweise zu Seiten mit entsprechenden Inhalten (bspw. Cracks, Hacks & Warez).

2.2) Das massenweise Erstellen von Beiträgen (sogenanntes Spamming) in einem kurzen Zeitraum ist untersagt.

2.3) Die Veröffentlichung von nicht öffentlichen Gesprächen (E-Mail, XMPP etc.) ist nur dann erlaubt, wenn alle beteiligten Parteien ihre Erlaubnis dazu gegeben haben.

2.4) Beleidigungen und Belästigungen sind generell verboten. Darunter fallen auch jegliche Formen der Diffamierung, Hetze, übler Nachrede und dergleichen.

2.5) Die Funktion des „Content Warning“ (Bild ist hinter einer Warnung) und taggen von „NSFW“ (Not Safe for Work, Text ist hinter einer Warnung) sollte für Beiträge benutzt werden, die potenziell nicht für alle Altersgruppen geeignet sind oder provokante Inhalte enthalten. (z.B.: Schwarzer Humor) Hinweis: Es gibt auch die Option Beiträge nicht in der öffentlichen Timeline erscheinen zu lassen.

2.6) Hyperlinks in Beiträgen dürfen weder Tracking-, Werbe- noch Partnerparameter (Affiliate) enthalten (z.B. amp, analytics, ads, ppc, cpc). Verweise zu Seiten welche nachweislich gefährlich sind oder betrügerische Absichten hegen, sind verboten.

3. Konto

3.1) Jeder Nutzerin und jedem Nutzer steht maximal ein Konto zu. Mehrfachanmeldungen sind nur mit schriftlicher Zustimmung von uns gestattet. (Bspw. zur Erstellung eines Projektkontos, oder zum Betreiben von Bots oder Zweitkonten).

3.2) Konten für kommerzielle Zwecke erfordern eine schriftliche Erlaubnis unsererseits. Die Anfrage ist formfrei per E-Mail an postfach@anoxinon.de zu richten. Das Konto muss aktiv im Fediverse, auf Mastodon teilnehmen. Interaktion in Form von nicht automatisierten, menschlichen Antworten auf Anfragen ist zu gewährleisten. Werbe- und Informationsveröffentlichungen sind in Anzahl und Umfang möglichst gering zu halten.

3.3) Wir behalten uns vor, Konten, die über 365 Tage keine Anmeldeaktivität aufweisen zu löschen.

3.4) Wir behalten uns vor, der Nutzerin oder dem Nutzer die Lizenz zur Nutzung des Dienstes zeitweise oder dauerhaft, jederzeit und ohne Angaben von Gründen zu entziehen. Ausgenommen davon sind gesetzliche Verpflichtungen und Bestimmungen.

3.5) Die Registrierung über ein Google-Mail Konto ist ausgesetzt und aktuell nicht möglich. Dies war aufgrund zahlreicher Spam accounts leider notwendig.

4. Bots/Bugs

4.1) Das Betreiben von Bots (automatisierte Konten) ist verboten, ausgenommen davon sind sogenannte „RSS Bots“. Alle anderen Bots benötigen die schriftliche Zustimmung von unserer Seite.

4.2) Bugs und andere Fehler sind uns zu melden. Ein bewusstes Ausnutzen dieser Bugs ist untersagt.

Sanktionen

Zuwiderhandlungen gegen diese Regeln werden in der Regel mit Ermahnung, Verwarnung oder Sperre geahndet. Bei schweren Verstößen, oder Verdacht auf Mutwilligkeit beim Verstoß behalten wir uns die Sperrung aller Konten bis hin zu einem Hausverbot für das gesamte Anoxinon.de Netzwerk vor. Sperrungen von Konten sind grundsätzlich personenbezogen. Bei einer Kontosperre darf kein weiteres Konto von derselben Nutzerin oder demselben Nutzer erstellt oder benutzt werden.

Schlussworte

Wir behalten uns vor, diese Nutzungsbedingungen jederzeit zu ändern sofern dies notwendig sein sollte. Dies betrifft u.a. technische und/oder rechtliche Änderungen sowie Vorkommnisse welche das Betreiben unserer Instanz massiv stören bzw. einschränken würden. Sollte es Unklarheiten bezüglich einer Regel geben, werden wir im Einzelfall prüfen und entscheiden.

Letzter Stand: 26.07.2023

Anoxinon e.V.

Instanz Sperren

Wir glauben an die Föderation und sehen die vollständige Sperre (Blockieren) einer Instanz als letzten Ausweg zum Selbstschutz. Vorher werden wir die Sperre von Medienanhängen oder das Stummschalten einzelner Instanzen/Nutzer:innen veranlassen. Angemeldete Nutzer:innen können auf dieser Seite einsehen, welche Maßnahmen getroffen wurden. Bei Fragen könnt Ihr uns gerne kontaktieren.

Hilfe

Unter folgendem Link findet ihr einen Artikel zum Einstieg in die Welt von Mastodon.
Short: Die offizielle Mastodon Instanz des Vereins Anoxinon e.V.

Description:
About Dice Camp

We're a Mastodon server for RPG folks to hang out and talk. Not owned by a billionaire.



We don't want your attention or your clicks. We're not the One TTRPG Network To Rule Them All. Just a place for people who enjoy tabletop RPGs to talk about stuff, not at all limited to games.



Why Join?

There's two parts to that: why Mastodon and why Dice Camp?

Why use Mastodon?

As an open distributed social network Mastodon provides some of the things you might like in a social network but with interests more aligned with your own.



A for-profit social network wants to drive profit through increasing usage and ads as far as possible.



Mastodon isn't owned by anyone. Nobody is going to try to show you ads or maximize engagement.

Why join Dice Camp?

Since Mastodon is distributed you can join any instance and connect to anyone else (except those blocked by admins, more on that below), so it doesn't matter all that much which instance you join. Think of it like email: you could have a GMail address or an Outlook address or both or more than that and still exchange messages with anyone else.



The factors to joining a given server are:



How many people are on the server? General purpose servers may end up with more signups and have trouble staying stable when, say, a billionaire buys Twitter.



Does the server have a topic that relates to your interests? While you can connect with anyone the folks on the same server will generally be easier to discover via trends or the server-wide "local" feed.



Does it have a cool name? Look, there's nothing wrong with choosing the one that sounds the coolest.
Short: A Mastodon server for RPG folks to hang out and talk. Not owned by a billionaire.

Description:
Report Handling

Below are rough definitions as to how moderaters will handle reports and what actions will be taken when a user report is submitted. Of course every report will be investigated thoroughly and punishments may be more or less severe based on moderator findings.

User level:

User Silence:
Minor infractions, heated arguments, frivolous accusations, and centrist rhetoric will result in the user being silenced. Users may still follow and converse with users that are silenced but their toots will not be federated.
User Suspension:
Major infractions, multiple and consistent infractions, abuse, hate speech, illegal content, and right wing politics will result in a full suspension. Users will be unable to interact with suspended accounts and, if the account is based on the instance, the user will not be able to log in or post.


Instance level:

Reject Media:
Applied to any server that allows illegal content and illicit porn. Can be applied to a server regardless of federated, silenced, or suspended status.
Domain Silence:
Reserved for instances whose politics are in violation of guideline 3. Currently consists mostly of Libertarian instances and gnu.social instances that have federated.
Domain Suspension:
Any domain that harbours hate speech, encourages the sharing of illegal content, or where admins have been unwilling to punish users violating guidelines 1 and 2 will be given a full suspension and will no longer be able to federate with our instance.
Short: Gc.c is an instance by trans women for trans folk and strives to keep the security and enjoyment of our users in mind.

Description:
Mastodon （長毛象）是一個自由、開放原始碼的社群網站。雖然設計上比較貼近 Twitter，但動態分享等等跟 Facebook 也類似。

不過重點是，Mastodon 是一個分散式的服務，避免您的通訊被單一商業機構壟斷操控。您可以選擇任何一個您信任的 Mastodon 服務站，在上面建立帳號，然後您就可以和任一其他 Mastodon 服務站上的使用者互通，享受無縫的社群網路交流。

協會雖然以 Facebook 為主要訊息發布管道，但是資訊自由也是協會關注的議題。Mastodon 的設計無疑地可以避免被 Facebook 之類的「演算法」過濾了訊息的問題。歡迎大家到協會的 Mastodon 服務站上註冊，並開始與站內站外的使用者互動，分享自由軟體、軟體自由或每天的心情。
Short: 這是中華民國軟體自由協會 (SLAT) 的 Mastodon 社交平台。
topic: 軟體自由協會 Mastodon 社交平台

Description:
If a user of this instance breaks the rules they will be contacted, and we will remove the reported posts or silence the account. Repeated offences will result in the user being suspended.

If a user breaks rules 1, 2, or 3 (above) they will be suspended without notice; their account and all of their posts will be deleted.

📢 Notices

  • This isn't an isolated community. Users on other instances might see your posts and can choose to follow you.
  • Adding CWs (content warnings) is a courtesy to users who might not want to see the content of your posts (e.g. media containing nudity, a movie spoiler, etc.).
  • All media posted on this instance is marked as sensitive for all users outside of our instance (core code change).
  • We block / silence other instances – or users from other instances – for abuse or legal reasons (view list).
  • We reserve the right to remove any posts or users from the instance.

👨‍💻 The instance

This Mastodon instance is hosted by @support on dedicated servers in Europe 🇪🇺

We run a fork of Mastodon called bottle, which has several customization specifically for ABDL.link.

We follow good security practices and have great uptime. We have twice daily backups, and use a CDN to store and deliver media assets. We also have a nice little status page.

This instance uses Mutant Standard emoji, which are licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International License. Also ABDL emoji created by @BabyTyler.
Short: ABDL.link is a community-led microblogging platform. We’re part of a decentralised federated network. ABDL.link is run on our own servers, supported by our patrons – we don’t sell your personal data.
